Cell.Data: Aren't you in the middle of a task? If you're not sure what to do, review the instructions below…

My name is Evangeline Baumeister. Some 40-odd years ago, a budding Chocolatier traveled the globe, restoring our recipe collection and helping me get Baumeister Confections back on track. But things are different now. It is the roaring 20's, innovation is the name of the game, and I myself have retired to Costa Rica. Perhaps you can help my granddaughter, Alexandra Tangye, turn things around once again. She always seems to have something up her sleeve...

Welcome aboard, [player]. I hope you can be discreet, because things are not going well and I need your help with a secret project.

Do you have any chocolate-making experience? It probably wouldn't hurt for me to quickly cover the basics for you, either way.

What do you say, shall I show you the ropes?

I like your moxie, [player]. So here's the deal, and I'll keep this brief. My dad, %sf_bchqkeep% is in charge of Baumeister Confections. He and I aren't getting along so well - but that's a different story. Anyhow, things haven't been going so well with our business, either - we've lost the spirit of innovation that this company was founded on. I want you to help me bring it back. Words haven't been working, so it's time for action!

Good choice. We'll start with making chocolates - as my grandmother Evangeline might say, it's hard to build a chocolate empire without them!

First we'll borrow the ingredients you need to make %b_01% - %sugar% and %cacao% - from here at Headquarters...

You should see 50 sacks of each ingredient in your inventory below.

Go to %sf_factory%, the old chocolates factory here in town, and see %sf_factorykeep%. He'll have you cranking out chocolates in no time flat.

Specific instructions for your tasks will pop up below…
Go see %sf_factorykeep% at %sf_factory%, the old chocolates manufacturing factory here in %sanfrancisco%.

Alexandra certainly seems excited about you, [player]. Based on what evidence, I cannot fathom.

Anyhow, you've got all we need to make %b_01%, so go on inside and click %minigame%

Make at least 10 cases.
I'm still waiting on those 10 cases of %b_01%. Enter the factory and click %minigame% to crank up the machines….

You should see the cases you just made in your inventory below, as well as any ingredients you have left over.

We'll make this many cases each and every week, as long as you keep the needed ingredients on hand.

Now go back and see Alex, she'll tell you what to do next.

Excellent!

Now let's turn those cases of %b_01% into something we can all use - cash!

Go find %sf_shopkeep% over at %sf_shop%, and sell her those cases of chocolates.
Greetings, [player]. Welcome to %sf_shop%. Step inside and take a look at what I'm willing to pay for each case of your chocolates. Click %sellall% to complete the transaction.
Click %sellall% to sell your chocolates to %sf_shopkeep%.
Remember, in order to sell me your chocolates, you need to click %sellall%.

Wonderful. I look forward to seeing you again - especially when you have quality chocolates to sell!

Now, go back and see Alexandra.

Some girls like diamonds. I prefer cash.

Keep an eye on your balance down there on the left. You'll need money to travel, and to keep ingredients stocked for your factories. Speaking of ingredients, let's buy some more %sugar%. Go to %sf_market% here in town and purchase 50 sacks.
Go to %sf_market% and buy 50 sacks of %sugar%.
Greetings, [player]. Step inside and have a look around. Click on the item you'd like to buy, use the register to enter how many sacks you want, and click the "Buy" button to complete the purchase.

It has been my pleasure to serve you.

Please give %sf_tutor% my warmest regards - if only she were in charge of things over there, and not that silly old father of hers…
Do remember to enter the quantity you desire and click %buy% to complete your purchase.

%sugar% can be found just about anywhere, but %cacao% only grow in a narrow band that hugs the equator. I'll give you some cash for a shopping trip. Click on "Travel" and then travel to %sanjose%, Costa Rica. Purchase 100 sacks of %cacao% from the market in town there.
Click on "Travel," travel to %sanjose%, Costa Rica and purchase 100 sacks of %cacao% from %sj_market%.
Hello, [player]. You've come to the right place for %cacao%. Enter the quantity you desire, and click %buy% to complete the purchase.

Wonderful - I certainly appreciate your patronage. You know, my family has been selling at this market for generations, and we've done a lot of business with the Baumeisters over the years. I certainly miss some of the old guard.

Oh well, do give my best to %sf_tutor% back in %sanfrancisco%.
Head back to %sanfrancisco% and see Alex at %sf_bchq%

You are doing swell!

Did you notice that your factory uses ingredients and makes chocolates as weeks pass while you travel? Let's take a look at the Factory Status window below….

Green bars represent plenty of a needed ingredient on hand, yellow means it's time to re-supply, and red indicates production will soon be stalled. Keep those bars green and your factories will keep making chocolates week in and week out!
A trip to New York City…

Keep an eye on your Factory Status as you travel....if you have the ingredients, you'll even see your factory cranking out chocolates as time goes by!

Speaking of travel, I want you to go to %newyork% and look up %ny_librarykeep% at the %ny_library% there. Bring him 10 cases of your %b_01%.
Deliver 10 cases of %b_01% to %ny_librarykeep% at the %ny_library% in %newyork%.

Welcome to The Big Apple, [player]. I remember the rise of Baumeister Confections, and it pains me to see what the company has come to of late. They're just not coming up with chocolates that capture the imagination. Speaking of chocolates, Alex said you'd have a new batch for me to try?
I was told to expect 10 cases of %b_01%, if I'm not mistaken….
Yum - your %b_01% are delightful. I will take 10 cases off your hands, pay you $5000 and hand over the recipe for %b_02%.

You may find these a bit harder to manufacture, but well worth your while when it comes time to sell them.

Before you head back to %sanfrancisco%, do yourself a favor: stop by and see %ny_factorykeep% at %ny_factory%

Ah, %ny_librarykeep% sent you over? Well then, [player], it's nice to make your acquaintance. The roaring 20s are upon us, and owning multiple factories is the only real way to compete in today's competitive confections landscape….
Go back and see %sf_tutor% at %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco%.

Welcome home, [player]. I see you've acquired a new recipe - for %b_02%. Make sure that you've got enough ingredients on hand to make 15 cases - you'll need at least 15 sacks of %sugar% and 30 sacks of %cacao%. Once you've got the ingredients, go see Ilya at %sf_factory%.
Make sure you have 15 sacks of %sugar% and 30 sacks of %cacao% in your Inventory and head to %sf_factory%.
You'll need at least 15 sacks of %sugar% and 30 sacks of %cacao% in order to make the 15 cases of %b_02% Alex is looking for….
I am waiting for you to bring me 15 cases of %b_02%....

OK, [player], you've got what we need to make the 15 cases of %b_02% Alexandra has asked for.

Step inside, click %reconfigure%, and choose %b_02%...
Bring 15 cases of %b_02% to Alex at %sf_bchq%.

Excellent work, [player]!
Listen, my father, %sf_bchqkeep%, is running Baumeister Confections. He and I aren't getting along right now - but that's another story. Things haven't been going so well with our business, either - we've lost the spirit of innovation that this company was founded on, and it's starting to affect our bottom line. Words haven't been working, so it's time for action!

What I need you to do now is establish your own confections business. We need to keep this secret from the big brass at Baumeister Confections - we'll worry about them later.

Start with the factory here in San Francisco, so I can keep an eye on things. First, go ahead and design a sign for your factory….
Take the first steps to establish a chocolate empire!

Good. Your sign will show up on any factories you acquire as you grow your business.

You have achieved the rank of %rank_1%! I'm going to give you some cash and a couple of recipes to help you get underway...

Also, some new ports are open for you to explore. Make sure to visit with people everywhere you can - you never know who might be able to help you. I'll also have tasks for you from time to time, so don't be a stranger. But remember, mum's the word as far as my dad is concerned - as far as he knows, you are working for yourself. Got it?

Good luck!
Owning a chocolates tasting lab would be a great way to discover fresh recipes for your chocolate business. I'll tell you one thing, those labs aren't cheap, though…

Sure, you can try to haggle with merchants and shop keepers. It will work sometimes, and you'll earn more profit, but don't overdo it - they may decide not to take your business after all. Like in all of life, some folks are easier to deal with than others...
Be sure to check back in ports you have visited - you never know when a new building will be opening up, and whom you might find inside.
So you're going out on your own, is that what I hear? Good for you - there can never be too many producers of chocolate, as far as I'm concerned.

I've been tending bar here for generations and, believe you me, I've seen plenty of ups and downs with those Baumeisters. And I tell you one thing, friend. That Alexandra, she's full of spit and vinegar, just like her grandmother, Evangeline….

I believe in true love. It took a long, long time, but it certainly worked out for me. Alexandra needs to follow her heart and not succumb to the pressures from her father, as difficult as that may be. She's always been a strong character, and I have no doubt that she will persevere.

I can't complain, things have turned out well. Evangeline and I moved here some years ago after we retired from the chocolate business. We did buy this cacao plantation, though, so we're still involved in the chocolate world, which keeps life sweet!
That Alexandra reminds me of her grandmother Evangeline, in her more spirited days. You two stick to your guns, and I'm sure everything will work out just fine.
You know, Dieter and I have loved owning this shop, but we might consider selling it some day if the right buyer were to come along. Do keep in touch as your business progresses.....

Welcome back, [player]. It seems that you are making good progress - keep up the good work. Do be sure to stop by again once you've gotten the hang of developing your own recipes in your chocolates tasting lab, so we can talk further...

Yes, I am a Baumeister, and I've enjoyed a life of chocolate, indeed! We're pretty settled here in Costa Rica, and I've been cultivating some wonderful cacao beans on this plantation. I appreciate your spirit of adventure - do keep in touch once you've got yourself more established....
Once you achieve the rank of %rank_3%, you'll be able to start manufacturing %truffle%. Then you'll really see your profit margins start to soar!

Looks like the sign over at BC Headquarters is in need of repair. I tell you, [player], I have seen this before. Once those big companies start ignoring the details, it's only a matter of time before things start heading down hill….
Yes, my family is in the chocolate business. As for me? Oh, I'm pretty content doing my own thing here in %cayenne%. It's not that I don't love chocolate, it's just that I don't love business!
You certainly look familiar to me, [player]. Are you not an acquaintance of my cousin Alexandra?

Sure, there are recipes to be found everywhere. I come across them myself from time to time. But, if you really want to make a name for yourself, you'll want to try to get to secret ports. Recipes with secret ingredients - now that's how you're going to distinguish yourself as a chocolatier in this day and age!

A man hears a lot of things tending bar in this town. And I hear you're in cahoots with Alexandra. She's a pistol, that one. Her dad may expect her to marry %villain01%, but between you and me, I understand there's someone else out there she's got her heart set on....
I don’t think Joseph's a bad guy, I think he just got complacent. And what father wouldn't want his daughter to marry a smart, successful businessman like %villain01%?
If I were you, and I was looking for something to do, I'd head for %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco% and check in with Alex….
You may want to stop by and see Alexandra at %sf_bchq% if you're looking for something to do….

I have an idea. I'll give you the recipe for %b_05%, if you'll agree to source the ingredients, make 20 cases and deliver them to %cay_barkeep% at the %cay_bar% in %cayenne%. She's a huge fan, and will pay you for your efforts.

So, will you do this for me, [player]?
Deliver 20 cases of %b_05% to %cay_barkeep% at the %cay_bar% in %cayenne%.
Were you not planning to bring me something sweet?
How lovely! %b_05%! Here's $15000, and a squares recipe that you might find valuable….

You definitely want to keep your product offerings fresh, otherwise you'll see prices start to nose dive. %ba_avenidakeep%, who is usually found in %buenosaires% at %ba_avenida%, might be able to help you out with a new recipe to try if you tell him I sent you. Interested?
There is only one %ba_avenida%, and you'll find it in %buenosaires%, down in South America…

Alexandra Baumeister told you to look me up? Is that right? Well, I do have a recipe around here somewhere - and a craving. If I hand over the recipe for %b_08% to you right now, will you bring me your first 35 cases of the same in exchange?

I can’t wait to taste what you come up with.

By the way, one can find delightful %lemon% for this recipe here at the market in town…
Bring 35 cases of %b_08% to %ba_avenidakeep% at %ba_avenida% in %buenosaires%.
Were you not planning to bring me something sweet? I am expecting 35 cases of %b_08%, as we agreed….
Let me taste - scrumptious! I must say, I haven't had %b_08% this good in years! Thank you so much, [player]. Here is some cash for your efforts, and I hope the recipe serves your business well.
Well howdy there, partner. Are you looking to build up your recipe collection, by any chance? I've got a wonderful recipe for %b_07%. Would you give me $9500 for it?

[player], do you remember, many years ago, I sold you a recipe for %b_07%? There's a new monument in %buenosaires% called the %ba_obelisco%. If you happen to get there one day, you may meet a woman named %ba_obeliscokeep%, who is a huge fan of anything with %orange%, and you may find her interested in striking a deal for some of these chocolates…
Stop by the %ba_obelisco% monument in %buenosaires% to inquire about an order for chocolates with orange….

Ah, as soon as autumn arrives, I start dreaming about %pecan%. You'll find that from %month_9% through %month_11%, the price of %pecan% will reflect that they are in season. Get them while they're cheap!

Might you be interested in acquiring a recipe that utilizes those wonderful little nuts?

OK, here's what you need to do. Go to %newyork%. First, stop at %ny_market% and purchase 20 sacks of %pecan%. Bring the %pecan% to %ny_barkeep% over at %ny_bar%. He'll exchange the recipe for the nuts.
Travel to %newyork%. Buy 20 sacks of %pecan% and exchange them with %ny_barkeep% at %ny_bar% for a new recipe.
%ny_barkeep% has a recipe set aside for you in %newyork%. Bring him 20 sacks of %pecan% in trade.
Unless I'm mistaken, I was under the impression that you might be stopping by with 20 sacks of %pecan% for me?

20 sacks of %pecan%? How can I resist? Here's a recipe for %b_11%. If you happen to remember, I'd certainly pay you top dollar for a couple dozen cases of those chocolates once you've got some made - you know where to find me!
Reminder: track down %ny_barkeep% once you've got a couple dozen cases of %b_11% in your inventory.
You remembered? I see you've got some %b_11% with you. I am a man of my word. I will offer you $125,000 for 48 cases. This is an exceptional price, and a one-time offer. What do you say?
Excellent. You are welcome here anytime…

I have a proposition for you, [player]. My cousin Chas has a birthday coming up, and I would like you to make some chocolates for him. Create 30 cases of %b_03%, and bring them to %cay_isleskeep% in %cayenne%. I'll give you some cash to cover expenses right now, and I wouldn't be surprised if Chas might be able to find something you could use once you bring him the chocolates. Agreed?
You're looking for %cay_isleskeep%? Last I heard, he was taking a little break from the pressure, hanging around %cayenne% at the %cay_isles%.
Deliver 30 cases of %b_03% as a birthday gift to %cay_isleskeep% in %cayenne%.
A birthday without chocolate is almost like no birthday at all….

These chocolates are for me? From Alex? Delicious! I'd like to give you a recipe, [player], one that uses seasonal fruit. You will find that the price of %raspberry% fluctuates intensely. You'll want to stock up on these between %month_6% and %month_8%, when they are in season.

By the way, Alex is my favorite cousin and I do love her dearly. Permit me to offer some advice. Ever since she was a child, Alex has done exactly what she has wanted to do, much to the consternation of her father. I don't know what you two are up to together, but do be mindful of the wrath of Joseph Tangye, if he finds out that something is afoot....
Would you have any interest in purchasing a recipe I happen to have? I'll let it go for $16500, a bargain at twice the price. What do you think?
A good choice. Here's the recipe for %b_10%. You'll need to make your way over to %paris% to find the %hazelnut%. I hope it brings you much fame and riches.

I was in %ba_market% earlier today and noticed that Veronica's got delicious looking %almond% for sale. It reminded me that I need to get a hold of 200 cases of %b_04% for a large affair we're having here at the Theater. Would you be interested in taking an order from me? I'll pay you $100,000 for 200 cases - trust me, this is a better price than you'll get at any shop. Will you make them for me?
%ba_teatrokeep% at the %ba_teatro% in %buenosaires% is anxiously awaiting your delivery of 200 cases of %b_04%.
Sell 200 cases of %b_04% to %ba_teatrokeep% in %buenosaires% for $100,000.
The date of our affair is rapidly approaching. I sincerely hope you are not going to let me down - I am counting on your delivery of 200 cases of %b_04%....

Let me sample those %b_04%. Wonderful! You have helped ensure that our party will be delicious, if nothing else. Here is the $100,000 I promised for the chocolates. I look forward to working with you again in the future.
Oh well. In that case, I guess I'll just have to give my business to someone else...

[player], I am glad to see you again. Those %b_05% you made for me a while back were absolutely delicious. I'd like to place an order for some chocolates to keep here in the bar. Would you be willing to bring me another 40 cases of %b_05%, as well as 40 cases of %b_06%, the recipe for which I gave you last time? I will pay you the tidy sum of $200,000. Deal?

I was just in the bank and I ran into %cay_barkeep%, from %cay_bar% in %cayenne%. She was withdrawing quite a bit of money, I believe to pay you for 40 cases of %b_06% and 40 cases of %b_05% she's expecting…
Deliver 40 cases of %b_05% and 40 cases of %b_06% to %cay_barkeep% in %cayenne%.
I've got the funds, do you not have the goods? I'm expecting 40 cases each of both %b_05% and %b_06%.
Oh, [player], you have not disappointed me. Here is the $200,000 I promised to pay you. I have no doubt that you're going to be quite successful in all of your endeavors. Cheers!

Is it really true that you've got a recipe for %b_07%? I simply adore %orange%. Just this once I am willing to pay in advance, if you're willing to take an order for me. I'll give you $60,000 right now if you will assure me that you'll come back with 85 cases of %b_07% for me. Do I have your word?
I don’t mean to meddle, but is it not true that you were paid in advance for 85 cases of %b_07% for %ba_obeliscokeep%? She's awaiting the chocolates at %ba_obelisco% in %buenosaires%.
Deliver 85 cases of %b_07%, for which you have already been paid, to %ba_obeliscokeep% in %buenosaires%.
Now, wait a second. I paid you in advance. I fully expect you to deliver the 85 cases of %b_07% that you owe me.
Excellent. As I say, I love %orange%, and I especially love your %b_07%. Thank you!

Here's some advice, [player]. Keep an ear open for opportunities to get a hold of some secret ingredients. I hear a lot of things tending bar here, and from what I understand, secret ingredients will be what separates the wheat from the chaff, in terms of chocolatiers.

In the meantime, I sure have a hankering for a couple dozen cases of %b_08%. I'll pay you well; are you interested in bringing me 24 cases?
Word on the high seas is that you are expected in %newyork% with 24 cases of %b_08%....
Make 24 cases of %b_08% and deliver them to %ny_barkeep% at the %ny_bar% in %newyork%.
I am expecting %b_08%. 24 cases, I believe I ordered?

Oh, those %b_08% look tasty. Here is $20,000 for the 24 cases I asked for.

And remember: secret ingredients, those are your key to success…

Oh well, thanks all the same.

And remember: secret ingredients, those are your key to success…

Tally ho! %b_09% happen to be some of my favorite treats. I have a unique proposition for you. You and I both know that %raspberry% are a seasonal fruit, and can be prohibitively expensive when out of season. I happen to have 500 sacks of these delightful little berries. If you commit to making me 100 cases of %b_09%, the rest of the fruit will be yours to do with whatever you wish. Have we a deal?
Excellent! I will find you in a couple of months, and will expect you to have my chocolates at that time. In the meantime, here are the %raspberry%. Good day!
It's high time you got the 100 cases of %b_09% together for %traveler03%, who will track you down on your travels…
Prepare 100 cases of %b_09% for %traveler03%, who will find you in a couple of months.
I trust you are toiling away on my 100 cases of %b_09%?
You have honored your promise, [player]. I will take those 100 cases of %b_09% off you hands now. I am duly grateful, and wish you nothing but success in all of your endeavors.

I am glad you stopped by, [player]. My brother's favorite number is 29 and he is about to turn 29, so I'd like to give him 29 cases of your %b_02% as a gift. While I don't have a lot of money to pay for the chocolates, I do happen to have 500 cases of valuable %cacao%, which I would trade you for the goods, to more than cover your expenses.
Claudia's brother's birthday rapidly approaches! I hope you're on your way to %sanjose% with those 29 cases of %b_02%....
Bring 29 cases of %b_02% to %sj_otherkeep% at %sj_other% in %sanjose%.
I have the %cacao% for you here; how are the cases of %b_02% for my brother coming along?

These %b_02% will make the perfect gift - thank you!

Here, as promised, are 500 sacks of %cacao% in exchange for the chocolates.

Hello [player], how are you making out with that recipe for %b_02%? We’ve got a large fundraiser coming up, and I'd be honored to make a purchase from you - if you were to bring me 100 cases, I'd pay you $65,000, a higher price than you're likely to find in shops. Will you bring me the chocolates?
I'm waiting for those 100 cases of %b_02% we spoke of recently….
Excellent. I look forward to sharing these chocolates, and I hope they put our patrons in the mood to donate! Here's the $65,000 I promised you. Be well!
%sf_tutor% would like an audience with you, [player]. Please stop by and see her at %sf_bchq% at your earliest convenience.
Alex is expecting you at %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco%.

[player], you are doing great and you are really starting to make a name for yourself. I wouldn't be at all surprised if you achieved the rank of %rank_2% soon. Once you do, you'll be able to buy a chocolates tasting lab which will truly enable you to grow your business...

Wow, [player], you have accomplished so much already - you have even discovered a secret port! Congratulations, you are now an %rank_2%. Additional ports are open for your exploration. Also, here are a couple of recipes for %infusion%. You'll need to upgrade the machinery in each of your factories to be able to make this type of confection, but you'll enjoy a higher markup on these in shops around the world.

To take your business to the next level, you'll want to do everything you can to buy the chocolate tasting laboratory. This is where you can try to develop marketable new recipes using secret ingredients - those ingredients found only in secret ports. As I've been saying all along, innovation is the name of the game these days. This is what my dear father fails to recognize.

Keep making me proud!

Those Baumeisters are a funny bunch, don't you think? It would serve you well to get to know Evangeline a bit, methinks. She is Alex's grandmother, and might offer a interesting perspective on the latest goings-on. Would you like me to arrange something?
Good. Here's what you need to do. Make 28 cases of %i_04%, and bring them to %cay_hotelkeep%. You'll find her at the %cay_hotel% in %cayenne%.
Take 28 cases of %i_04% to %cay_hotelkeep% at the %cay_hotel% in %cayenne%.
%pa_moulinkeep% told me to expect 28 cases of %i_04%.....

I have been out of the thick of things for some time, but I do try to keep up with the big picture. I agree with Alexandra that things have certainly gotten complacent over there, but I'm not positive that yours is the right way to go. Anyhow, I'm rambling. Thank you for the chocolates, which look lovely. Here's a recipe for %i_05% for you to use - you'll want to buy %raspberry% when they are in season, of course. Do keep in touch as things develop...

Hello, there [player], might you be interested in acquiring some new recipes for your business? If you're willing to make a significant number of cases of %i_02% and deliver them to my friend %pa_cafekeep% at the %pa_cafe% here in %paris%, I can promise a couple of valuable recipes in return. What do you say?
Make 136 cases of %i_02% for %pa_cafekeep% at the %pa_cafe%.
Once you've got 136 cases of %i_02%, track down %pa_cafekeep% at the %pa_cafe% in %paris%.
My friend assured me that you would be arriving with 136 cases of %i_02%; I am counting on the same!
These %i_02% look most excellent. As promised, here are a couple of recipes in return for your wonderful chocolates.

I have a recipe here that uses local ingredients. I have been holding on to it for some time, waiting for the right chocolatier to come along. If I hand over the recipe now, will you bring me 25 cases of the chocolates once you've got them manufactured?
Make 25 cases of %i_10% and bring them to %ab_villagekeep% at %ab_village% in %abidjan%.
Hello again, [player]. Was our deal unclear? I gave you the recipe for %i_10%, and I am waiting for 25 cases of them in return….
Stupendous. Thank you for the chocolates - and I hope the recipe serves you well!
Please travel to %sanfrancisco% and go see Alexandra - she has something she would like to speak with you about.
Thank you for coming, [player]. I am happy to hear that you're getting the hang of developing marketable recipes in your tasting lab. This will really help what we are trying to accomplish!

I have a couple of recipes for chocolate sauces for you - you will need to upgrade each of your factory's machinery in order to produce these - but they are commanding a tidy sum in sweets shops around the world of late. Keep up the good work, and I'll be looking forward to hearing reports of your wonderful sauces creations!

[player], I understand that you have been expanding your repertoire to include %sauce%. Very cunning, indeed. You might try bringing a few dozen cases of your %s_02% to %ba_shopkeep% in %buenosaires%. If you present them to Julio with my compliments, he may be willing to share a sauce recipe that he's been working on. Interested?
Julio, over at %ba_shop% in %buenosaires%, seems to be under the impression that you would be bringing him 48 cases of %s_02%...
I have been working on a sauce recipe, this is true. I might be willing to share it, but I'd like to sample your %s_02% before I would consider doing so.

I had word from %traveler07% to expect you. I am willing to share my recipe for %s_10%, in exchange for 2 favors: First, I will take 48 cases of your %s_02%. Second, you must promise that you will deliver a case of %s_10% to our mutual friend, Juan. Do we have a deal?

Excellent. Here is the recipe. Once you've got some made, you'll need to track down Juan. If you have trouble finding him during your travels, you might try to look for him in %casablanca% at the %cas_lighthouse%...
Make some %s_10%, and then track down %traveler07% to give him a case.
Are you searching for %traveler07%? Do you have a case of %s_10% for him? Here's a hint: go to %casablanca% and look for him at the %cas_lighthouse%.
It's good to see you again, [player]. Although, I must admit, I was kind of hoping that you might have something for me?
A case of %s_10% for me? How delightful! I am so glad things worked out between you and Julio - he truly is a gentleman of the highest order.

Here's a tip. Make your way to %cayenne% and look up %cay_farmkeep%. His knowledge of chocolates could fill several volumes, and he's been known to come up with some pretty incredible recipes. Will you go see him?

I am glad things are going well for you, [player] - are you managing to stay out of trouble? Listen, I could use your help with a little surprise I'm planning. I've been working up a recipe for %s_11%, combining my own varietal cacao with normal %cacao% as well as some of the wonderful %pepper% from these parts. If I hand over the recipe, will you promise to make 40 cases and deliver them to my wife over at the %cay_hotel% here in town?
Wonderful. You can, of course, buy the pepper at %cay_market% here in Cayenne, and the specialty cacao you'll need from me here…
Deliver 40 cases of %s_11% to %cay_hotelkeep% at the %cay_hotel% in %cayenne%.
You've got the recipe, right? All you need to do is make 40 cases of %s_11%, and bring them to %cay_hotelkeep% at the %cay_hotel% in %cayenne%.
My darling husband Jarrah certainly seemed to be hinting at a surprise for me…

My goodness! What a wonderful treat!

Listen, [player], take this for what it's worth. I don't mean to frighten you, but I have it on good authority that Baumeister Confections is not happy about what Alex is trying to do. But you stick to your guns, and don't let them bully you around.

I've been looking for you high and low, [player]. I'm hoping that you're willing to take a huge order for a client of mine, %pa_towerkeep%, who is hosting a large affair at the %pa_tower%. If you're willing to produce and deliver 200 cases of your delightful %s_02%, Yves will not only pay you $100,000, he will also hand over a couple of %sauce% recipes from his personal collection. Will you take this order?
Manufacture 200 cases of %s_02% and deliver them to %pa_towerkeep% at %pa_tower% in %paris%.
I had word that you accepted the terms of my order? I have what I promised you, where are my 200 cases of %s_02%?

Perfect! I am sure your %s_02% will be the talk of the town come next Monday morning. Here is the cash that I promised for the sauces, as well as a couple of other recipes that I committed to provide. Enjoy!
Alexandra has requested an audience with you, [player]. Please find your way to %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco% to meet with her at your earliest convenience.

[player], thank you for coming to see me. Things have come to a head here. It's worse than I thought with my father. He found out what has been going on, and he is not pleased. I want you to go east, and do some things for me on that side of the world. In the mean time, I'll try to get things under control here.

At this point there is no turning back. The most important thing is to keep building up your business and growing your recipe book. I don't know what the future holds, but I may not be working with my father for long. As if our business problems weren't enough, he is still convinced that I will marry Christoph. I would sooner marry an elephant!
First, go see %ca_shopkeep% in %cairo%. He's an old friend of my grandparents. He and I have spoken at length, and he'll be expecting you….

Nice to meet you, [player]. I've been settled here in Egypt for some time, although I, too, once traveled the world. Alex suggested that you and I could work together for a while. I've been looking for someone to take ownership of this shop, too, so I'm hoping this is the start of a long and prosperous relationship for both of us.

I also have here a handful of %praline% recipes for you. You'll need to upgrade the machinery in your factories to manufacture these but, trust me, the increased margins on this type of product will more than make it worth your while.
So, what I'd like you to do first is make 50 cases of %p_01% and deliver them to %ca_bridgekeep% here in town at the %ca_bridge%. Can you handle that for me?
Prepare 50 cases of %p_01% and bring them to %ca_bridgekeep% at the %ca_bridge% in %cairo%.
What I'm looking for is 50 cases of %p_01%. Does this ring any bells for you, [player]?
You have 50 cases of %p_01% for me, on behalf of %ca_shopkeep%? Why, that's wonderful!
I happen to know that if you would be willing to deliver several cases of %p_02% to my friend %ma_farmkeep%, he would exchange a valuable recipe for the chocolates. Interested?
Good choice. Make 44 cases and take them to %ma_farmkeep%, who runs the %ma_farm% in %mahajanga%.
Take 44 cases of %p_02% to %ma_farmkeep%, who runs the %ma_farm% in %mahajanga%.
%ma_farmkeep% has a terrific recipe for you in %mahajanga%. You just need to show up with 44 cases of %p_02% on hand…
I have a recipe here which I am holding for you, [player], as long as you bring me those 44 cases of %p_02%....

These %p_02% are simply amazing chocolates, [player]! I have a recipe here that takes advantage of our local cacao. I have been holding on to this recipe, waiting for a chocolatier such as yourself to impress me. I am happy to give it to you now, and hope that you use it in good health and prosperity.

Hello there, [player]. I see that you do not have the recipe for %i_09%. I happen to have this recipe myself, and would gladly hand it over to you if you would be willing do something for me. I'll give you the recipe, if you agree to make 48 cases and deliver them to %cay_isleskeep% in %cayenne%. What do you say?
Deliver 48 cases of %i_09% to %cay_isleskeep% at %cay_isles% in %cayenne%.
I received a telegram from my colleague %traveler04%, in which he mentioned 48 cases of chocolates that he had arranged to have delivered to me here. Do you know anything about this?

Oh, how wonderful! I was told to expect these, and I simply adore %i_09%.

I am glad that things are going so well for you and Alexandra. Be on the lookout, though. %villain02% recently passed through town, and he was asking some pointed questions about you...

You have taken over Cyrus' shop, isn't that so? Well, Cyrus is one of my all time favorite people, so any friend of his is a friend of mine. And today, my new friend, is your lucky day. I've got a %praline% recipe here for you - no strings attached. Enjoy %bombay%!
Things seem to be going pretty well for you, [player]. Are you looking to expand your collection of recipes, by any chance?
In that case, you should make sure and go see my father, %sj_farmkeep%, in %sanjose%. He's cultivating cacao at %sj_farm% there, and will be happy to offer some advice….

Hello, [player]. How is that daughter of mine? I do hope she decides to settle down one day. Not that I myself married young or anything! Anyhow - you're looking for a new recipe? I've been working on something that uses some of my %sj_cacao%, %hazelnut% and, of course, %sugar%. I'm happy to share it with you, and I hope it sets the world afire!
Of course, I'm happy to supply you with as much %pepper% as you care to purchase…

I am sure that you are aware of our reputation for having the finest pepper in the world, yes? Have you ever thought of using pepper in one of your chocolate concoctions? I may be able to offer some guidance. Are you interested?

All right. Here's a recipe for %i_12%. You can buy wonderful %pepper% from me here, and the %ca_cacao% you'll need from %cay_farmkeep% over at %cay_farm%. With ingredients of this quality, I'm confident you'll be able to make something not only incredibly delicious, but highly marketable as well!

You are doing quite well, [player]. In order to achieve the next rank and become a %rank_3%, you will need to develop a few more recipes in your laboratory. Be sure you stop by your lab often, especially when you have new secret ingredients to experiment with.
[player], I have some good news to share. You have achieved the rank of %rank_3%! You must make your way to %sanfrancisco% and go see Alexandra. She needs to speak with you right away.
At last we meet, [player]. I am Alexandra's father, and head of Baumeister Confections. Did you two really think we'd simply sit by idly and then join forces? How naïve!

You have caused our family much pain and hardship. I have sent Alexandra away. I sincerely hope that one day she will recognize the error of her ways and come back into the fold. Christoph is not happy, of course, but how can I blame him? Now be gone, and if you know what's good for you, you'll stay away from Baumeister Confections!
Pssst. Listen, [player]. Alexandra needs to speak with you - she has secured passage for you to %jakarta%. You will find her there, at %ja_other%. Go see her right away…
Go find Alexandra at %ja_other% in %jakarta%, Indonesia.

[player], am I happy to see you! I honestly thought that my father would see the error of his ways, but he's under the spell of that Christoph Moreno! How could I be so stupid? There's no turning back now. We've got to take this thing all the way, and take over Baumeister Confections ourselves! I hope you're up for the challenge...

Here's what we need to do: You need to keep expanding your empire, creating new products and growing the business. You'll definitely need to have taken over all six factories in the world before we'll ever be able to fulfill this dream. We need to win over some key members of the BC board, as well as expose that no-good Christoph for what he is.

Some good news is that as a %rank_3%, you are now qualified to manufacture %truffle%. I've only got a couple of recipes for these, which I'll give you now. The others can be gathered from folks around the world, or developed in your lab with the correct ingredients.

Another bit of good news is that %ja_otherkeep%, who owns %ja_shop% here in town, may be interested in selling his shop, if we prove ourselves to be worthy. I'll be here, laying low, working on the master plan. Do stay in touch, as we'll need to work quickly once I figure out the steps we'll need to take...

[player], I am a fan of %t_02%. If you agree to make 30 cases for me, I would be willing to part with a recipe for %t_01% - a recipe, I might add, that was given to my aunt Evangeline by a mysterious stranger. If you agree to make the chocolates for me, I'll find you on your travels to collect them. Do we have a deal?
Have 30 cases of %t_02% on hand for the next time you run into %traveler16% during your travels.
%traveler16% is a very kind woman, but she gave you a recipe and she is counting on you to make her the 30 cases of %t_02% you promised…
Ah, [player], funny bumping into you! I'll find you again, and I am really looking forward to tucking into those 30 cases of %t_02%.
Now those are some incredibly fine %truffle%. I am sure you will work wonders with this recipe for %t_01%, and I can also assure you they will do wonders for your profits. Be well!

I understand that you're qualified to manufacture %truffle%. Have you met %sh_shopkeep%, over at %sh_shop% here in town? She has an incredible palate, and also a wonderful idea for a %truffle% recipe that she might share with the right person. If you were to show up with 20 cases of %t_02%, just to show her you know what you're doing, I think you might be pleasantly surprised. Want to try?
Bring 20 cases of %t_02% to %sh_shopkeep% at %sh_shop% in %shanghai%.
I'm hoping that you just might show up one day with 20 cases of %t_02%, [player]…

I definitely know a good %truffle% when I taste one, and your %t_02% are delightful. Step inside, and I'll gladly purchase your entire stock.

I'd also like to share an idea I had for a %truffle% recipe - one that uses a secret ingredient from the Himalayas....

Make sure you have the following on hand at your tasting laboratory: %sugar%, %cacao% , %lavender%, %macadamia% and %powder%. I have a hunch that a recipe you create with this combination of ingredients will prove to be extremely profitable….
Make sure your tasting laboratory has %sugar%, %cacao% , %lavender%, %macadamia% and %powder% to create a fantastic truffle recipe.

We have no Chocolate Shop here in %manila%, but that doesn't mean we don’t appreciate fine chocolates. I've got a recipe here that uses the special %ph_cacao% we grow here at this plantation. If I hand this recipe over to you, will you guarantee me that you'll bring me 85 cases of the product once you've got them made?
I understand from %man_farmkeep%, over at %man_farm% in %manila%, that you are supposed to be arriving with 35 cases of %t_07% on hand for him?
I'm counting on you, friend, to bring me those 85 cases of %t_07% we discussed…..
I just knew you would make wonderful %t_07%! Thank you so much, [player], and we'll always be happy to supply your %ph_cacao% needs in the future.

I don’t know what it is about %ginger%, exactly, but I love the stuff. I've got a great recipe here, for %t_09%, that I might see my way to parting with in exchange for some other chocolates made with %ginger%. Interested in making a trade?
Excellent. All you need to do is bring me 60 cases of %s_06%, and I'll hand over the %truffle% recipe I mentioned. I'll be anxiously awaiting your return….
Make 60 cases of %s_06% and bring them to %mos_otherkeep% in %moscow%.
A deal is a deal, my friend. I'll hand over the recipe when you hand over the chocolates.
The trade you arranged with %mos_otherkeep%, I believe, calls for you to bring 60 cases of %s_06% to him at %mos_other% in %moscow%.
Thank you, [player]. Here is the recipe for %t_09%. If you ever care to oblige me, I promise to pay you extremely well for 24 cases of those %truffle%.
Keep in mind that %mos_otherkeep% in %moscow% has promised to pay extremely well for 24 cases of %t_09%...
I see you have 24 cases of %t_09% on hand for me. I am a man of honor, and I honor my word. I will give you $85,000 for those 24 cases. I told you, I love %ginger%. Deal?
I appreciate your keeping me in mind, and I look forward to enjoying your wonderful chocolates.

I'm not even sure if the recipe for these exist yet, but I sure would fancy some truffles made with %cherry%, %anise%, and a varietal cacao from this side of the world. If you were to bring me, oh, let's say, 33 cases of something like that, I might just be able to part with a new recipe for your endeavors....
Bring 33 cases of truffles made with %cherry%, %anise% and a varietal cacao to %sh_bundkeep% in %shanghai%.
Are you having a hard time getting the %truffle% together? I'm expecting 33 cases of something made with a combination of %cherry%, %anise% and a varietal cacao….

If you haven't done so already, I believe you need to create the recipe for these truffles in your tasting lab. Make sure you've got %sugar%, %cherry%, %anise%, %ja_cacao% and of course %powder% on hand there and work with %ba_labkeep% at %ba_lab% in %buenosaires%.....
Oh, how marvelous! You were able to produce exactly what I have a hankering for!
Listen, [player]. One good turn deserves another. Go see %ny_librarykeep% in %newyork%, and bring him 1 case of those marvelous %t_06% with my compliments.
Take a case of %t_06% to the %ny_library% in %newyork% with the compliments of %sh_bundkeep%.
I had word from %sh_bundkeep% that you might be showing up, but she mentioned something about a case of very special %truffle%.....
This is weird, but I had this dream. And in my dream, you showed up in %newyork% with a case of %t_06% in hand for %ny_librarykeep%.....

%t_06%? Now those are some delicious %truffle%! I don't know if %sh_bundkeep% mentioned it, but I have a recipe here I'd like you to have. This is a remarkable pairing of %coconut% and %almond% that makes for a most indulgent treat. I think you will find that these will command an excellent return on your investment.
I have some exciting news to share with you, [player]. Your success with truffles has caught the attention of some very influential people. You must go speak with Alex in %jakarta% at once!

Congratulations, [player], you have achieved the rank of %rank_4% - a well-earned promotion! Things have been going well here, too. I've been speaking with %ja_otherkeep%, and I feel he is close to letting us take over the shop here in %jakarta%. Let me think about the best way to approach him, and I'll send for you when the time is right.
In the meantime, I want you to go see my great aunt Rowena in %sydney%. She's getting up there in years, but she is still sharp as a tack and has lived through a whole lifetime of chocolate-making.
Go visit with Alex's Great Aunt Rowena at the %syd_shop% in %sydney%.

Believe me, [player], I know what it's like to be on the outs. A long time ago, I did some foolish things, and ended up causing a rift in my own family. I am here to tell you, however, that time soothes all sorrows and families can get back on track. You just keep on the straight and narrow, and things will work themselves out.

The good news is that as a %rank_4%, you can now start to manufacture %exotic%. These one-of-a-kind creations are difficult to source and produce, but the profit margins are the highest you'll find anywhere. To get you started, I'm going to give you the recipe for %e_01% - this was something my father Hieronymus, who started Baumeister Confections out of this very shop, was working on just before he died.....

Apart from this one, the rest of the recipes for %exotic% you will need to develop in your tasting laboratory. Keep your ears open for new ideas. And remember: the folks that work in the shops you own are often your best source of ideas for valuable, marketable recipes to discover, so be sure to check in with them regularly.

Let me tell you something, [player]: I believe that you could use %saffron% to make a wonderful Exotic. If you're willing to do some experimenting in your tasting laboratory, I can let you know of a way to make a bundle with this spice. What do you say, would you like to hear me out?

Well, take some %saffron%, which you can find in %sahara%, as well as some %coffee% and other basics to your lab. Discover a recipe for %exotic% that uses these ingredients, and then configure one of your factories to make them. Once you've got 50 cases made, go see %bom_other1keep% in %bombay%. He will reward you handsomely for those 50 cases.
Make 50 cases of an Exotic made with %saffron% and %coffee% and bring them to %bom_other1keep% in %bombay%.
I did have word to expect 50 cases of something new, something with %saffron% and %coffee%, and I was so looking forward to tasting them….

If you haven't done so already, you'll need to create this recipe in your tasting lab. I can't say too much more than that, other than it's an %exotic%, and it uses %saffron% and %coffee% as well as %cacao% and %sugar%....

I have never tasted anything so interesting and wonderful at the same time! I am going to give you $600,000 for 50 cases - believe me, you won't see a price that good in any store! Thank you, [player].
I have a message from Alex - she would like a word with you. Are you able to go see her now?
Alex is anxious to speak with you. She's waiting for you at %ja_other% in %jakarta%.
Thank you for coming so quickly, [player].

I have had word from %ja_otherkeep%. He is sympathetic to our cause, and wants to do what he can to help. I need you to bring 48 cases of your %e_01% to him. You find him, of course, here in Jakarta, at %ja_shop%.
Bring 48 cases of %e_01% and bring them to %ja_otherkeep% at the %ja_shop% in %jakarta%.
Alex told me to expect you, but she mentioned that I should also expect several dozen cases of your %e_01%...
Alex has promised %ja_otherkeep% at %ja_shop% in %jakarta% that you would bring him 48 cases of your fabulous %e_01%....

Thank you, [player]. I am entirely sympathetic to your efforts, and I want to do everything I can to help. Alex is a good soul, and I will be happy to hand over control of my shop to support what you two are trying to do. There is one more thing, though, that I'd like to ask you to do first. I just need to experience first hand your ability to discover new offerings - I completely agree that this is the key to your accomplishing what you desire.

So do not sell me those 48 cases of %e_01% - instead, take them to %man_otherkeep% in %manila%. Luz will be able to help secure passage for you to a secret port to help you fulfill my request. What I am asking you to do will take some time, but I want you to discover 3 new recipes in your lab. I don't mind what the recipes are, as long as you've got 3 new recipes in your recipe book when you return. Are you up for the challenge?
Take 48 cases of %e_01% to %man_otherkeep% at %man_other% in %manila%.
I may indeed be able to help you get to a new, undiscovered location. To do so, though, I'd like to ask for 48 cases of your %e_01%, which I have been very much looking forward to tasting!
You must go see %man_otherkeep%, and you must bring him 48 cases of %e_01%. You can always find Luz at the %man_other% in %manila%.

Thank you for the chocolates, and I can surely help you, [player]. I have secured a route for you to the secret port of %fiji%. I know that you will be able to find some amazing new secret ingredients for your chocolates there. Once you have developed 3 new recipes in your laboratory, go back and see %ja_otherkeep% at %ja_shop% in %jakarta%.
Make sure that there are 3 new recipes in your recipe book and go back and see %ja_otherkeep% at %ja_shop% in %jakarta%.
Discover 3 new recipes, and then go back and speak with %ja_otherkeep% in %jakarta%.
I am here to help, but I am waiting until you have 3 new recipes in your recipe book. You'll need to experiment in your tasting lab in order to develop 3 new, marketable recipes.
There's really no way around experimenting. Make sure you've got a hold of any and all the ingredients you can, and visit your lab to try to discover new, marketable recipes.
I knew that you would not let me down, [player]. I have no doubt that you will succeed in all you set out to do. Here, as promised, are the keys to my shop.
I am so glad that you and Alex are sticking to your guns! Don't worry, I know that some Baumeisters may not be happy about the way things are turning out right now, but I am sure they'll come around.
You know, I've always thought one could make some wonderful %exotic% by combining %pepper% and %currant%. Have you ever tried something along those lines in your lab?
Whitney suggested combining %pepper%, %currant%, and some other basic ingredients in your lab to discover a new Exotics recipe.

I'm glad you decided to swing by, [player]. %ja_otherkeep% is here for a visit, and he was just telling me about a great idea for a new Exotic recipe. It sounds like a winner to me. Would you be willing to do something for him in exchange for his advice?

Hello, [player], I am glad things are working out all around. I have a hunch about a combination of ingredients that may make a highly desirable Exotic. I'm going to hand over 1 sack of each ingredient, and you will bring me 25 cases of the chocolates once you've got them made.

The ingredients I've been experimenting with are: %ja_cacao% from right here in %jakarta%, %ma_cacao%, %mango%, %plantain% and %sugar%. You should be able to combine them in your lab to come up with a delightful new Exotic. I'll be looking for 25 cases back at %ja_shop%.
Combine %ja_cacao%, %ma_cacao%, %mango%, %plantain% and %sugar% to make a new Exotic recipe. Bring 25 cases to %ja_otherkeep% at %ja_shop% in %jakarta%.
%ja_otherkeep% described a new Exotic recipe to make in your lab. Bring 25 cases to him in %jakarta%.

Did you somehow misplace the ingredients you were given, [player]? You need to combine %ja_cacao%, %ma_cacao%, %mango%, %plantain% and %sugar% to make a new Exotic recipe. Once you know the recipe, make 25 cases and deliver them to %ja_otherkeep%, who you will find on %ja_other% in %jakarta%.
25 cases of %e_04% was our deal, was it not? I assume that you will honor your commitment, [player].
Splendid! I hope you sell oodles of %e_04%, and that you see your profits soar!

Well, an important part of building any successful business is listening to the customers, and our customers are clamoring for an Exotic chocolate made with %ant%, %plantain%, %coconut%, and %ja_cacao%. You might want to try experimenting with this combination in your lab, and do remember that our market here in %jakarta% stocks wonderful %coconut%.
You might try experimenting with %ant%, %plantain%, %coconut%, &sugar% and %ja_cacao% in your laboratory.

My grandmother's kitchen always smelled so incredibly wonderful! I recall the aromas of clove, ginger and anise swirling together. Have you thought to experiment with such a combination in your laboratory? I know I would pay very, very well for an Exotic made with such a delightful combination of spices...
[player], we ran into each other a while back, and I mentioned an idea I had for an Exotic recipe. Perhaps you recollect our meeting? In any event, would you like some more specific information?

What you need to do is experiment in your lab with %cacao%, %sugar%, %anise%, %ginger% and %clove%. Believe me, this is a winning combination! And if you manage to make something with this combination, I'll be happy to pay very, very well for some of the results.
A self-starter, eh? That's the spirit! I'm quite sure you'll manage to discover the recipe in your laboratory one of these days!
Work on an Exotic in your lab that combines %cacao%, %sugar%, %anise%, %ginger% and %clove%.

Ah, [player], good day to you! I see you have taken my advice, and have produced some wonderful %e_06%. Well, I am prepared to offer you, right now, $650,000 for 24 cases of those delightful concoctions. I will not make this offer again. Will you sell me the chocolates right now?
Wonderful! I will certainly enjoy these chocolates, and I hope the cash serves your business well.
Oh, well. I understand. I guess I'll have to look for these at my local shop.

Welcome back to %ca_shop%, [player]. Have you ever heard of nibs? They are the latest fad in Exotics, and our customers have been asking after them fairly regularly. Nibs are simply roasted cacao - nothing more. Gather a selection of varietal cacaos from all over the world, and see if you can't develop a marketable nibs recipe down in your laboratory...
%ca_shopkeep% recommends experimenting with different combinations of varietal cacaos in your lab to create an Exotic.

I've been speaking with some of our customers, who are clamoring after chocolates that combine our wonderful %sj_cacao% with %ma_cacao%, %orange% and one of the aromatic spices found in The Sahara. I must admit, the combination sounds like a delicious exotic to me as well!
Customers are asking for a recipe that combines %orange%, %sj_cacao%, %ma_cacao% and a certain Saharan spice.

Salutations, [player], it’s good to welcome you back to your shop.

Are you looking for hints for what to experiment with in your lab, by any chance? I have a hunch that combining varietal cacaos from Africa with caramel and a Himalayan spice might be just the ticket for a wonderful new Exotic….
Felix, at your shop in %casablanca%, proposed combining African varietal cacaos with %caramel% and a Himalayan spice in your chocolate tasting laboratory.

So nice to see you again, as always. If you're interested, I think you will find it worth your while to go see %ab_farmkeep% at %ab_farm% in %abidjan%. She's got some interesting ideas for a new Exotics recipe. Are you interested in making the trip?
Visit %ab_farmkeep% in %abidjan% to hear about her ideas for a new Exotics recipe.
Yes, [player], I have been thinking that if you combine %tea% and %pecan% with %sugar% and some of my wonderful %ab_cacao%, you may just discover a mouthwatering Exotic recipe.
%ab_farmkeep% has an idea that combining %ab_cacao%, %pecan%, %tea% and %sugar% might lead you to discover an Exotics recipe in your lab.

Owning shops gives you many advantages, [player], including a direct line to what our customers are asking for. Try experimenting with some wonderful %ca_cacao%, which you can purchase at %cay_farm%, along with a nut, an ingredient from %fiji%, %sugar% and a touch of %powder% - there's an incredible Exotics recipe somewhere in that combination....
%ca_shopkeep% encouraged experimenting with %ca_cacao%, a type of nut, a secret ingredient from %fiji%, %sugar% and %powder% in your tasting laboratory.

[player], I can not believe the empire you have managed to build! You are truly an exceptional chocolatier! I have a bit of advice, if I may: Try combining %berry% with some sugar and an assortment of varietal cacaos in your lab - I do not think you'll be disappointed.
It is %traveler15%'s opinion that you'd do well to combine an assortment of varietal cacaos with %sugar% and %berry% from Fiji in your tasting lab.

You are doing amazingly well, [player]. Your recipe book is impressive, and your chocolates command high prices around the globe. I can not tell you how much it means to me that Christoph has been exposed, and my parents have reached out to Sean. Things are looking up for us! The only thing that remains is for you to take possession of all 6 factories in the world. Once you have done so, we'll be able to make our move.
[player], Alexandra needs a word with you. Go and track her down as soon as you have a chance.

You have done remarkably well in all your efforts, [player]. Your empire is strong, your recipe book is incredible, and your chocolates are in demand around the globe. Christoph and his entire gang have been duly dispatched. The time has come for us to make our move. That's right, we're going to take over Baumeister Confections!

This will not be easy, but I've got a plan. What you need to do is make sure you continue to discover all the recipes that you can. Your Recipe Book will need to be complete before we can take over the company. And, we'll use the Exotics you've created to win over the key decision makers on the BC Board of Directors - some will be easier than others...

Once we've secured the support of the entire Board, the company will be ours!

So, are you ready to get started with my plan?

I knew I could count on you. There are 5 family members on the BC Board - Evangeline, Rowena, Felix, Dieter, and of course my father Joseph. Once we've got each of their support, the company will be ours. We'll start with a relatively easy one: Bring this letter as well as 50 cases of your %e_01% to Evangeline in %cayenne%.
Bring Evangeline 50 cases of your %e_01%. You'll find her at %cay_hotel% in %cayenne%.
I had word from my granddaughter Alexandra to expect you to arrive with 50 cases of Exotics. Was there some sort of miscommunication?
[player], you continue to impress me with your delightful concoctions. Let me take a look at that letter from Alexandra….

You have my full support. My fellow Board members, however, may not be so easy to convince. I wish you nothing but the best of luck. Take these papers back to Alexandra for me, and I'm sure we'll be seeing each other soon.
Bring the papers from Evangeline back to Alex in %jakarta%.

I knew we could count on Evangeline, [player]. She has always been in my corner. Now I'm going to need a bit of time to have these papers worked on - these are what we'll need all 5 Board members to sign in order to take over Baumeister Confections.

What I need you to do is to try to fill your recipe book with Exotics recipes. Once you've got the right recipes, I'll send you on quests to deliver the right Exotics to the right people in order to secure their signatures. Eventually you'll need to have all 12. So give me a few weeks to work on my part, and make sure you've accumulated as many recipes as you can..
Fill your recipe book with Exotics recipes in order to try to win the hearts and minds of the Baumeister Confections Board.
I'm still working on those papers, and I trust you're still working on gathering Exotics recipes….
I'm glad I ran into you, [player]. Alexandra has something she'd like to speak with you about. When you're not busy, stop by and see her in %jakarta%.

I see that you have the recipe for %e_08%. These will be perfect for my Great Uncle Dieter, he always enjoys chocolates made with the varietal cacao that he cultivated himself. Make him 75 cases, and bring them with the paperwork for him to sign to his plantation in Costa Rica.
Bring the papers and 75 cases of %e_08% to %sj_farmkeep% in %sanjose%.
I really look forward to tasting your %e_08% - and I'm happy to provide the %sj_cacao% you need to make them, as well!

Thank you for those delightful %e_08%! Your continuing success, and your latest creations, prove to me that you are capable of running the big show. I will sign the papers now. You and Alexandra have my blessings, as well as my full support.
If you have a chance, go visit %sf_tutor% in %jakarta%. I believe she was looking for you not too long ago.

You've got just the recipes to help convince my uncle %cas_shopkeep% to agree to our plan. I've already explained to him what we're trying to do, so I'm confident that if you are able to bring him 100 cases each of your %e_09% and %e_10% he'll sign the papers. Are you up for the task now?
Bring the papers, 100 cases of %e_09% and 100 cases of %e_10% to %cas_shopkeep% in %casablanca%.

Alexandra has explained the situation to me in complete detail, and I think it would be just fine for you and she to take over Baumeister Confections. I do, however, have one slight, final reservation; one that can be assuaged with 100 cases each of a couple of your newer Exotics....
We have been through a lot together, and you have earned my trust. I will accept the Exotics you have brought to me and, with pleasure, sign my name on the appropriate paperwork.
I have a message for you, [player], from Alexandra. She would like to meet with you in %jakarta% as soon as you are able to make your way over there.

Are you ready to meet with Aunt Rowena? You've got just the recipe for the perfect Exotic for her - %e_03%. Bring her 200 cases and see if she'll be willing to sign the papers to transfer ownership of Baumeister Confections to us.
Bring the papers and 200 cases of %e_03% to %syd_shopkeep% in %sydney%.
I have been through a lot, and nothing surprises me anymore. Once you bring me the 200 cases of Exotics, I have no doubt that I will be able to help you out.

I, for one, have experienced the ups and downs of a life in chocolate. For a long, long time I was estranged from my own dear family, and it was all due to my own blindness to the truth. Certain men seem to have the ability to fool many, many people. And Christoph Moreno is one such man.

Anyway, I'm boring you. I am prepared to sign the papers, but I'd like you to do me a favor first. I want to do everything in my power for Alex - life is simply too short for one not to follow one's heart. I want you to track down Sean Fletcher on %him_mountain% in The Himalayas. Prepare 60 cases of your %e_05% for him. He'll know what this is about.
Take 200 cases of %e_05% to %him_mountainkeep% in the Himalayas.
Rowena is right, life is too short not to listen to one's heart. Weren't there some chocolates she told you to bring to me, however?
I have always cared for Rowena, [player]. She's right - I owe it to her, and to myself, to give things one more chance.
Would you please bring Alexandra a letter for me, as well as 12 cases of %e_06%, and also 12 %rose% from %abidjan%? It would mean a great deal to me. Thank you in advance, [player].
Take 12 cases of %e_06% and 12 %rose% to Alexandra from Sean.
You have seen Sean, my one and only true love? It would be quite unlike Sean Fletcher to send you back to me without flowers, chocolates, or both….

[player], I have been waiting for this letter for so long. Everything is falling into place for us! As much as I have always cared for Sean, I refused to break my father's heart. But I can now see the light at the end of the tunnel - I am confident that as soon as I work things out with my father, Sean and I will be able to be together, at long last!
We're really making wonderful progress. At the rate you're going, we'll be in control of Baumeister Confections in no time flat! Keep up the great work!

[player], you are very close to being ready to take over Baumeister Confections. All that remains for you to do is to collect more recipes - your Recipe Book needs to be totally complete in order for you to make your move. You'll want to chat with everyone you can meet, and continue to work on recipes in your lab.

[player], we are almost ready to make our move. Before we can approach my father, your Recipe Book needs to be absolutely complete. Be sure to speak with everyone you can - you never know who might be able to help you with a new recipe. Also, remember that shops you own are a great source of ideas for new recipes to develop in your lab...
Alexandra is anxious to speak with you, [player]. I suggest you make your way to %ja_other% in %jakarta% as soon as it is convenient for you.

[player], we have 4 of the 5 required signatures we need in order to assume ownership of Baumeister Confections. All that remains is for us to convince my father that this is the correct thing to do. I know that the other members of the Board have spoken to him on our behalf. He must also realize by now that on his own, he won't be able to turn things around. I think he's ready.

Your Recipe Book is complete. Now, with one more extraordinary effort, my father won't refuse us. What you need to do, though, is quite challenging: You must make 100 cases of each and every Exotic - that’s right, 1200 cases total. I'll meet you at Headquarters in %sanfrancisco% once you've got all of the chocolates on hand.
Take %sf_bchqkeep% at %sf_bchq% 100 cases of each of your 12 Exotics.

I have seen the error of my ways, and I am just about ready to consider your offer. All that remains is for you to honor your commitment, and to show up with the massive amount of Exotics I have been told to expect.

[player], today is a bittersweet day for me. I am ready to sign the papers. I now realize that this is for the best. My daughter was right, and I was wrong. She is here now, and I have had a chance to apologize in person - I only hope that some day she can fully forgive me. I want to apologize to you as well for any hardship I may have caused you, and your company.

Your prowess at discovering new recipes is unsurpassed. Based on your success to date, I am sure that you will be able to restore the good name of Baumeister Confections in no time flat. I am only going to take 1 case of each of your Exotics for myself. You may sell the rest and use the cash to keep growing your chocolate empire. I have signed the papers, and this company is now yours - your sign will replace ours here at Headquarters. Alex wants to share some other good news....

Congratulations, [player]! You have done it! It seems like only yesterday that you first arrived on the scene, and now look at you! I will never be able to thank you adequately for all that you have done for me and my family. But I do have some good news...

It is with the utmost pleasure that I would like announce that you are now officially Chief Executive Officer of Baumeister Confections! You have proven yourself beyond any of our expectations, and the title is well earned. You are truly a gifted chocolatier as well as businessperson, and your promotion is cause for a little celebration....enjoy!

Remember, you're going to need to have all 72 recipes - including all 12 Exotics - in your recipe book in order for us to get this job done. Keep talking to folks, and keep up the good work in your chocolates tasting lab!

We're getting closer, but there are still some people to please. You'll need to have filled your recipe book completely. Keep working in your tasting lab to try to discover the recipes we need. Also, keep in mind that you never know who might be able to help steer you in the right direction....

[player], you are performing magnificently - I'm astounded at the amount of capital you have been able to amass. How would you like to purchase a Corporate Airplane? Owning this will reduce all travel times by half, and all travel costs to zero. This will really make a difference as you zip in and out of secret ports. Apart from that, you really can't put a price tag on style and elegance. For $2,500,000, it can be yours. What do you say?
Now traveling first class, all the time, with a Corporate Airplane.
Terrific. I guarantee that you will be pleased with your purchase. Your Corporate Airplane will be ready for take off for your next journey. Happy flying!

Listen, your best bet is to hook up with %ca_shopkeep%, over in %cairo%. I heard some talk about his ability to arrange passage to %bombay%.

However, if you prefer, I do happen to have a visa here that will open up the port for you. From me, it will cost you $500,000, which is ultimately a lot more expensive way to go. Would you like to go ahead and purchase the visa from me?
Probably a smart choice. As I said, do what you can to buddy up with %ca_shopkeep% - he's a good man to know….

Owning the chocolate tasting laboratory is a great way to develop new recipes for your business. It's the only way you'll ever be able to take advantage of any secret ingredients you manage to find, as well.

Be sure to visit your chocolate tasting lab often, especially when you've got new ingredients on hand, to generate new recipes to keep growing your business! Customers demand fresh product offerings, and they're willing to pay well for them, too.

I understand that there's a chocolate tasting laboratory down in %buenosaires% that's on the market. You'll need a lab in order to develop recipes using any secret ingredients you're able to get a hold of. Those labs are not easy to come by, though. You'll need to have $150,000 on hand, and have achieved the rank of %rank_2%, before you'll be able to buy the place...

I understand that there's a chocolates tasting laboratory down in %buenosaires% that is on the market. You'll need the lab in order to develop marketable recipes using secret ingredients. I recommend you go see %ba_labkeep% at the %ba_lab% down there - he can fill you in on the details. Interested in learning more?

So here's the skinny. With a chocolates tasting lab, you'll be able to create marketable recipes with secret ingredients - a must if you're trying to really grow your chocolate empire. There's really no other way to stay competitive in today's market. I have the deed to the laboratory right here - and I am prepared to sell you the Chocolates Tasting Lab for $150,000. What do you say?
I need 150000 big ones for the lab. Come back and see me when you've raised the required capital.
OK - I'll take the hundred and fifty grand, and the lab is yours. Round up some secret ingredients, head inside and have some fun…

Terrific, you have made a smart choice, [player]! Whenever you stop by, we'll grab one sack of any of your ingredients that we haven't seen before. You'll go inside and we'll let you know if we've got any possible combinations that will result in a marketable recipe. So be sure to visit often, especially when you've got new secret ingredients for us to play with!
Bonjour, [player]! I stock only the freshest ingredients here, several of which you may find to be most welcome in your tasting laboratory…

If I may be so bold as to offer you a suggestion: Round up some %anise%, which you can only find in the secret port of %sahara%. Make sure you've got some %sugar% and %cacao% on hand, and visit your tasting lab in %buenosaires% to work on Infusions. I have a feeling it will be worth your while...
Take some %anise%, %sugar% and %cacao% with you to your %ba_lab% in %buenosaires%.
You know, [player], I've always thought we could make a really terrific sauce with %saffron%, %cacao%, %sugar% and %milk%. Have you thought of giving that combination of ingredients a try?
I don't know, I still think that we could make a terrific sauce with %saffron%, %cacao%, %sugar% and %milk%. Why don't you give that combination of ingredients a try?
Try combining %saffron%, %cacao%, %sugar% and %milk% to make a new sauce recipe in your lab.

You are doing wonderfully, [player], and I couldn't be happier. Have you ever considered using %currant% in one of your sauces? I think I know someone who might be able to help you with this - are you willing to take a trip to gather some more information?
Sharp thinking. All you need to do is go see %sa_oasiskeep% in the %sahara%. She'll tell you everything you need to do.
Travel to %sahara% Desert and chat with %sa_oasiskeep% about a new sauce recipe.

Welcome, [player], I hope your travels are going well. You are after a sauce recipe that uses my delightful %currant%? Bring some, along with %cacao% and %sugar%, to your lab. I'm sure you'll be able to develop something highly profitable with my one-of-a-kind ingredient...
Combine %currant%, %cacao% and %sugar% in your %ba_lab% in order to create a new sauce recipe.

I am sure that you are aware of our reputation for having some of the finest cacao in the world, yes? Have you ever thought of combining our varietal cacao with one of your secret ingredients in one of your chocolate concoctions? Are you interested in hearing a bit more about what I have in mind?
All right. Buy some %ab_cacao% from me here, and make sure your lab has %plantain% on hand. Combine these with %sugar% and see if you can't come up with a new recipe….
Try combining %ab_cacao%, %plantain% and %sugar% in your lab to make a new sauce recipe.
Combine %ab_cacao%, %plantain% and %sugar% in your lab to make a new sauce recipe.
I know that %ab_farmkeep% is trying to help you out. I trust that you have brought us some %ab_cacao% to experiment with?
Terrific! We'll keep that %ab_cacao% here with your growing collection of ingredients.

My friend %bom_other2keep%, in %bombay%, has something that would prove to be of immense value to your business. I strongly recommend that you visit with him at your earliest convenience. If you'd like, I can let him know that you're on your way. Shall I do so?
Unless something has changed, you should be able to find %bom_other2keep% at the %bom_other2% in %bombay%.
Ah, [player], my friend %traveler05% let me know you'd be coming to see me.
If you're game to do something for me, I may be able to offer you something that I am most certain would significantly aid your efforts to grow your business. Are you up for a challenge?

OK, what you ultimately need to do is bring me 25 cases of a new type of %praline%.

I will show you a route to a secret port: %himalayas%, where you'll find a few new secret ingredients. One of those ingredients is %clove%. Combine %clove% in your lab with other ingredients - all of which can be found in %mahajanga% - to create a new %praline% recipe. These are the chocolates you must bring me 25 cases of.
Discover a %praline% recipe using %clove% and other ingredients from %mahajanga%. Deliver 25 cases to %bom_other2keep% in %bombay%.
Have you tried combining %clove% with %ma_cacao%, %sugar% and a unique spice from the %ma_market% in your lab?
I know this is challenging, but I am looking for something specific - 25 cases of a new type of %praline% made with %clove% and 3 other ingredients from %mahajanga%.

You, [player], have truly outdone yourself. These %p_08% are simply majestic. I am most sure that the secret ingredients, found only in %himalayas%, will allow you to create recipes in your lab that will bring you much profit and fame…

I've been to %fiji% - wondrous country out that way. And the pumpkin you can get there - wow! It's occurred to me that combining %pumpkin% with %ginger%, %macadamia%, %sugar%, and a varietal cacao would make one heck of a %praline% recipe....
%traveler11% suggests experimenting in your lab with %pumpkin%, %macadamia%, %ginger%, %sugar% and a varietal cacao.

Hey, [player], I don't want to tell you your business, but I have a bead on a particular combination of ingredients, including several varietal cacaos, that I think would make for an excellent %praline% recipe. I can give you some more specifics, if you're interested, and you'd be willing to make me a couple dozen cases of the Pralines once you've gotten the recipe. Shall I spill the beans, so to speak?

Okay, here are the ingredients you'll need to round up and have in your tasting laboratory: %sj_cacao%, %ca_cacao%, %ma_cacao%, %currant% and %sugar%. Once you've got all that on hand in your lab, you'll be able to develop the recipe and, more importantly, make me the chocolates!
No worries, friend. You should be able to discover the recipe in your lab, should you care to do so.
Make sure that you have %sj_cacao%, %ca_cacao%, %ma_cacao%, %currant% and %sugar% at your chocolates tasting lab.

We can create all kinds of recipes here, but I understand you're interested in developing something specific? I trust you have the %sj_cacao%, %ca_cacao%, %ma_cacao%, %currant% and %sugar% that we'll need…
Once you've developed the recipe for a Praline that uses %currant%, %ma_cacao%, %sj_cacao%, %ca_cacao% and %sugar% in your lab, make 24 cases for %traveler10%.
Make 24 cases of the Pralines with %currant% for %traveler10% who will find you to claim the chocolates.
The recipe you need to create for %traveler10% is for %p_11%. Make sure you're working on Pralines recipes, and combine %currant%, %ma_cacao%, %sj_cacao%, %ca_cacao% and %sugar% in your tasting lab.
I helped you with the recipe; I would like to collect my 24 cases of %p_11% sometime soon…
Yum! Well, this worked out well all around! Thank you so much for the chocolates, and I hope the recipe you developed brings you much success!

Welcome back to your shop, [player]. Our customers have been asking for something new. I have an idea for a combination of ingredients that might satisfy their needs - would you be willing to do some experimenting to try to create a new recipe in your lab?

That's great news. You'll need to have some unique ingredients at your lab - %cinnamon% from Indonesia, %lavender% from The Himalayas, as well as %ab_cacao% and %sj_cacao%. I'll fill Teddy at your lab in as well…
Make sure your lab has %ab_cacao%, %sj_cacao%, %lavender%, %cinnamon% and %sugar% for a new Pralines recipe.
