%ca_shopkeep% let me know what you have in mind. I trust you've brought us at least one sack of each of the following ingredients: %ab_cacao%, %sj_cacao%, %lavender%, %cinnamon% and %sugar%?
Looks like you have everything you'll need to work on that recipe %ca_shopkeep% suggested…
Once you've got the new recipe in your recipe book, go back and touch base with %ca_shopkeep% in %cairo%.
Discover the recipe for %p_12% and then stop by your chocolate shop in %cairo%.

Has something gone amiss? I really think a recipe for %p_12% will do wonders for our business here. Just combine equal parts of %ab_cacao%, %sj_cacao%, %lavender%, %cinnamon% and %sugar% in your lab to create a new praline recipe.
I'm glad to see that you were able to uncover the recipe for %p_12% - it's always good to listen to customers!

I imagine that you'd be able to come up with a delightful truffle recipe combining some of my %ab_cacao% with %ma_cacao%, as well as %sugar% and %powder% and the secret ingredient %currant%. You should visit your %ba_lab% and give it a whirl.

I don’t doubt that if you were to combine some of my %ma_cacao% along with %ab_cacao%, %currant%, %sugar% and %powder% in your tasting lab, you would be able to create a scrumptious truffle recipe....
Gather some %ma_cacao%, %ab_cacao%, %currant%, %sugar% and %powder% and visit your lab to try to create a new truffle recipe.

Hello, my friend. I think you could develop a very marketable recipe for %truffle% using my fresh, wonderful %pumpkin%. I think it would go great with some sugar, truffle powder, and a combination of varietal cacaos from around the world. Why not visit your lab and give it a try? What have you got to lose, eh?
Try experimenting in your lab with different combinations of specialty cacaos as well as %pumpkin%, %sugar% and %powder% to develop a new recipe for %truffle%.

It's good to see you back in your shop, [player]. I've been talking with some of our customers and I feel that a new truffle, made with %tea%, would go over quite well. If you're going to be heading to your lab anytime soon, you might try combining %tea% with a few varietal cacaos, sugar and truffle powder....
Have a combination of specialty cacaos as well as %tea%, %sugar% and %powder% at your lab to try to develop a new recipe for %truffle%.

You know, [player], I've been in this business a long, long time. I think a truffle with a combination of %berry% and several varietal cacaos would do really, really well. Try visiting your lab and experimenting with %berry%, %sugar%, %powder%, and different combinations of varietal cacaos - I bet you'll be able to come up with something new!
Try experimenting in your lab with different combinations of specialty cacaos as well as %berry%, %sugar% and %powder% to develop a new recipe for %truffle%.

[player], we have developed all the recipes we can in the lab! Hard to believe, but true. I am glad that we have been able to accomplish so much together! Any remaining recipes you'll have to look for elsewhere, I'm afraid. You are, of course, always welcome to stop by and gaze at the amazing array of ingredients you have brought to us over the years...

Your recipe book is totally complete! That is certainly quite an accomplishment, [player]. I'm so glad that we were able to help you out along the way. Do feel free to visit any time you're in town and would like to admire the incredible variety of ingredients you've brought us over the years….
xxxx SECRET PORT REVEAL QUESTS xxxx

Listen, [player]. I understand that you're trying to make a name for yourself in the chocolate world. Well, how would you like access to a secret location, where you can find some truly unique secret ingredients? For $10,000, I can grant you this access. What do you say?

You're going to go far with that kind of spirit, [player]. A secret location is now open to you, deep in the Amazonian jungle. You won't find a whole lot there, but what you do find should prove to be of immense value to your business, once you've got a chocolate tasting laboratory up and running...
One more thing to keep in mind - there is no place to sell your chocolates in some of these more remote ports, so make sure you've got enough cash on hand to get there AND back, before you head off…

I hear that there are secret ports out there, with secret ingredients just waiting to be discovered. Those kinds of places are not cheap to get to, however. You'll need to have at least $15,000 on hand before you'll be approached with an opportunity to get out to one of those remote locales....
Welcome to the jungle! We have been using cacao for ages, and a delicacy of ours is chocolate-covered ants. Perhaps you would like to purchase a supply of %ant% for your own experimentation?

By the way, you will not simply find recipes that use our secret ingredients. You must create these recipes yourself, in your tasting laboratory, by experimenting with combinations of secret and normal ingredients….
You are after %ant%? Sure, I've got some. They're $15000 for 200 cases. Shall I wrap them up for you?
Wonderful. If you need ants, you know where to find me….

Do you remember %sj_shopkeep% mentioning that she and Dieter might consider selling their shop one day? I heard a rumor that they have been giving this some serious thought of late. It might be a good time to stop by and chat with her. Would you be interested in checking in with her yourself now?
Stop by %sj_shop% in %sanjose% to visit with %sj_shopkeep%.

I've been hearing good things about you, [player]. We are indeed thinking of selling this shop sometime soon, so let's keep in touch. I only wish these Baumeister family squabbles could be settled once and for all, but I guess I've been a part of this family too long to expect that.

Listen, would you be willing to do something for me? My customers are looking for an Infusion made with dark chocolate and the secret ingredient %plantain%. If you don't have a recipe, I believe you should be able to come up with something in your lab. Would you be willing to make me 60 cases?
Deliver 60 cases of an Infusion made with %plantain% to %sj_shopkeep% at the %sj_shop% in %sanjose%.
I am very glad to see you again, but I was hoping you'd be showing up with the chocolates we discussed - 60 cases of Infusions, made with dark chocolate and %plantain%.

If you're having trouble with the recipe, make sure your %ba_lab% in %buenosaires% is stocked with %cacao%, %sugar% and %plantain%, and try experimenting with Infusions using this combination of ingredients...

Terrific! I am so pleased that you were able to create these confections for me. I'll be happy to buy the lot of them - step inside and we'll talk turkey.

In terms of this shop, give me a few weeks to talk things over with Dieter. Stop by next month and we'll see what's to be.

So here's the scoop. Dieter and I like you. We like you a lot, in fact, and we think you'd be a great owner for this shop. Now, all you need to do is get sufficient funds together - our price is $75,000.

My husband and I have discussed this at length, and we feel strongly about supporting your efforts. We know that you and Alex are doing the right thing. So, we would be honored to sell you this shop. For $75,000, this will be your store. We will always pay the highest prices for your wares. In addition, we still know a lot of people in the chocolate world, and knowing people often has certain benefits. So, would you like to buy our shop?
Excellent. This shop is now yours.
%sj_shop% is your shop, [player]. How can we be of service?
I trust all is well with you, [player], it is always a pleasure to see you again!

I know that you are looking to expand your operations, [player]. I also know that %cas_shopkeep% is considering his options in terms of what to do with his shop. He is also rumored to have passage to a hidden port. Are you interested in heading to %casablanca% now to do some investigating?
Travel to %casablanca% to visit with %cas_shopkeep%. He might be starting to think about selling his shop...

Welcome to %cas_shop%, [player]. I have been hearing all kinds of good things about your efforts. The younger generation of my family, I just don't know what to say... Things were not always so difficult. Oh well, go ahead inside….and do come back in a few weeks - I am expecting a new recipe, and I may have an offer for you to consider….
My friend %cas_shopkeep% has been expecting you to stop by again. Do be sure to swing by %cas_shop% whenever you're next in %casablanca%...
Be sure to pay %cas_shopkeep% a visit at %cas_shop% in %casablanca%....

Thank you for coming by again, [player]. I was indeed able to get my hands on a new recipe - for %s_07%. There may be more where that came from, too. In any event, I'm interested in getting 100 cases of these over to my brother, %sj_farmkeep%, in %sanjose%. Would you do this for me, in exchange for the recipe?
Don’t get me wrong, it's not that I'm not happy to see you again. It's just that, well, I thought you might be bringing me a bunch of cases of a new sauce from my brother?
From what I can tell, all you need to do is bring 100 cases of %s_07% to %sj_farmkeep% at %sj_farm% in %sanjose%.
Wow. That is an amazing batch of caramel sauce. You have got quite the touch, [player].
Would you please be so kind as to take this letter back to my brother for me? Thanks!
A letter from my brother? Let me read that….

Things have gotten worse than I thought. I'm going to have to think about what's to be done with that Joseph Tangye. In the meantime, I have another recipe I want you to have. This one requires %ginger%; it may be a while until you make your way to Asia to get a hold of some, but at least you'll be ready with the recipe.

I'm also wondering if I can ask you another favor? Our anniversary is coming up, and I've been so busy here at the shop. Would you be willing to travel to %abidjan% and purchase some flowers for my wife? I'll more than cover your expenses…
Fabulous - here's $35,000 for your travel, the flowers, and your trouble. I really appreciate this, [player], and so will my wife!
Travel to %abidjan% to purchase some flowers for %cas_shopkeep%'s wife in %casablanca%.
Purchase a dozen %rose% and a dozen %tulip% and deliver them to %cas_marketkeep% at %cas_market% in %casablanca%.
I don’t mean to be rude, it's only that my husband was acting very strange and the anniversary of our marriage is coming up. He usually acts this way when he's trying to surprise me with something….

Oh, how lovely! What a wonderful surprise! My husband absolutely thinks the world of you. You know, we're not getting any younger, and there's lots of the world I'd like to see. I wonder if you would have any interest in purchasing the shop from us? If you might be interested, go over and speak to Felix.

I was in %casablanca% a while back, and I had occasion to chat with Shani over at %cas_market%. She said she expected you to speak with her husband over at %cas_shop%, and that he hadn't seen you? You might want to stop by his shop the next time you find yourself in %casablanca%...
Be sure to pay %cas_shopkeep% a visit at %cas_shop% in %casablanca%....

Yes, I have thought about selling this shop. Let Shani and I come up with a price. In the meantime, I'd like to ask you to do one more thing. I would like to see what you can come up with in your tasting lab. I don't mind what it is, just make sure you've got a new, invented recipe in your repertoire when you come back and see us again. Are you up for the challenge?

Great. To help you out, I have a map to a secret port in the Sahara desert. By traveling to this port, you will be able to find some new secret ingredients to experiment with. I am confident that these new ingredients, combined with other ingredients you can easily find, will prove for some fruitful experimentation in your tasting lab...
Develop a new recipe in your tasting lab, and then go back to meet with %cas_shopkeep% at %cas_shop% in %casablanca%.
%cas_shopkeep% is simply looking for you to invent a new recipe at %ba_lab%. Gather new ingredients, bring them to the lab, and see if you can't come up with something new for your recipe book.

We're making progress. Are you? I am looking for you to come back again after you've invented a new recipe at the %ba_lab%, so we can discuss the details of transferring ownership of this shop to you….

I couldn't be more pleased with your efforts, [player]. Shani and I have discussed everything. We feel $125,000 is a very fair price for this shop. Give us a month or so to finalize the paperwork, you gather the necessary funds and come back when you're ready to make the purchase.

%cas_shopkeep% is looking for you, [player]. Everything is in order - as long as you've got the money together, he is ready to sell you his shop. Would you like to travel to %casablanca% now to talk this over with Felix?
See %cas_shopkeep% in %casablanca% to discuss taking over his shop.
I see you have raised the money - and I have prepared all the paperwork - are you here to buy our shop for $125,000?
Well, I understand. The shop will be here for you whenever you're ready….
Terrific. Congratulations, the shop is now yours!
This is your shop, [player], you are always welcome here!

I can't speak for the veracity of this, but I did hear tell that %ca_shopkeep%, the owner of %ca_shop% in %cairo%, thinks quite highly of you and what you're trying to do. You'll want to keep in touch with him, [player]. He's an honest man and quite well connected in the world of confections...
Be sure to stay in touch with %ca_shopkeep% at the %ca_shop% in %cairo%....

Welcome back to %ca_shop%. I appreciate what you are trying to do, and I want to continue to help. I know that we've spoken of you taking over this shop. Well, I've got a proposal for you, [player]. I'm no longer young, so I'm not looking for piles of money. I do, however, have a number of favors to return for friends around the world. If you agree to help me with a series of tasks, once they are completed, I'll hand over the keys to this shop. Do we have a deal?

Wonderful. Your efforts will mean a lot to my friends as well as to me. First, I'd like you to bring 60 cases of %p_03% to %pa_moulinkeep% in %paris%. Hernan and I are old buddies, and we've tasted many wonderful chocolates together over the years. You can usually find him at the %pa_moulin%.
Deliver 60 cases of %p_03% to %pa_moulinkeep% at the %pa_moulin% in %paris%.
You are working for %ca_shopkeep%? He is a wonderful friend, and one of the last of the true gentlemen. Did he not intend for you to bring me some %praline%?
I have a message from Cyrus. He wanted me to remind you to make sure to bring 60 cases of %p_03% to %pa_moulinkeep%.
From Cyrus? That man is a gentleman and a scholar, and there are too few of us left! Please, do give him my sincerest thanks!
I was recently in %cairo%, and I believe %ca_shopkeep% is eager to see you again - he mentioned something about some unfinished business? Might you have some time to go see what he's talking about?
Go meet with %ca_shopkeep% in %cairo% regarding some unfinished business.

There's a friend of mine in %casablanca% whose name is %cas_otherkeep%. He can usually be found at the %cas_other% there. I'd like for you to bring 75 cases of %p_05% to him - I've got the recipe for you right here, if you're willing to do this for me. Okay?
Make 75 cases of %p_05% and deliver them to %cas_otherkeep% in %casablanca%.
I haven't heard from Cyrus in a long, long time. Strange, though, he usually thinks to send along some chocolates….
These wonderful creations are from Cyrus? What a truly wonderful gift. Would you be willing to take something back to Cyrus for me?

Terrific. I'm going to give you a dozen cases of %p_03%. I want you to deliver these on my behalf to Cyrus. Make sure you don't do anything silly like sell these chocolates before you get back to Cyrus! Cheers!
Take %cas_otherkeep%'s 12 cases of %p_03% to Cyrus at the %ca_shop% in %cairo%.
I have been told to expect 12 cases of %p_03% from Amar. Do you not have them on hand?
A dozen cases of %p_03%? These I will not sell - I'm going to enjoy them myself!

Okay, [player]. You are doing very well by me, I am most pleased. Next - and I know this is a lot to ask, but I do have a lot of friends in %buenosaires% - I'd like you to take 96 cases of %p_07% to %ba_teatrokeep%. Don't worry, I'll hand you the recipe right now. Will you take care of this for me?
Convey 96 cases of %p_07% to %ba_teatrokeep% at %ba_teatro% in %buenosaires%.
You come in the name of %ca_shopkeep%? Cyrus has a lot of friends around here, and they're going to need a lot of chocolate. 96 cases of %p_07% should just about do the trick….

There are a number of fans of %ca_shopkeep%'s here in %buenosaires%, and we will all be most pleased with these incredible %praline%. I will be sure that Cyrus knows how happy we are with all that you have done. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

%ca_shopkeep% mentioned to me that he has been wondering when he might see you again. Did you perhaps have some business to discuss with him? You might think about stopping by %ca_shop% soon. Is %cairo% is in your travel plans?

You have made my friends around the world very happy. And, when my friends are happy, I am happy. There is just one more person to please, but I must warn you, she is one tough cookie. Her name is %mos_shopkeep%. It would take too long for me to tell you the entire story, let me just tell you that true love never fades away. Are you willing to help me try to win her heart right now?

Wonderful. Agnessa loves %orchid%, as well as pralines with %mint% and %coffee%. The flowers will be easy - you can simply buy the %orchid% in %abidjan% at %ab_flowers%. For the pralines, I have a recipe for you right here…
So, bring a case of %orchid% and 60 cases of the chocolates to Agnessa, and I'll be forever grateful…
Take a case of %orchid% and 60 cases of %p_04% to %mos_shopkeep% at the %mos_shop% in %moscow%.
%orchid% can be found in %abidjan%. For %p_04%, and make sure that you have %mint% and %coffee%, as well as %sugar% and %cacao% in your inventory…
How can one not appreciate Cyrus? He is a dear, indeed, but I'm a sucker for chocolates, and flowers, if you know what I mean..
That Cyrus, he is one persistent son of a gun. But how can I resist these lovely flowers and delicious chocolates?
Do be a sport and carry this letter back to that dear man for me, would you?
Bring %mos_shopkeep%'s letter back to Cyrus in %cairo%.
Do you truly have a letter for me, from the one and only Agnessa? Let me read that….

[player], she will have me! You can not possibly know what this means to me! You have done more for me than you will ever know. And now, it is only right that I do some things for you. First, this shop is yours, as promised. I'll look forward to serving you for years to come.

Second, just in case you have not yet discovered the route, I have secured passage for you to %bombay%. Do be sure to go to %bombay% soon and, when you arrive, look up %bom_other2keep% and tell him I sent you his way.
Make your way to %bombay%, look up %bom_other2keep%, and tell him Cyrus sent you.
Greetings, [player], it's good to see you again!

Welcome to %ja_shop%. I am %ja_otherkeep%.

I want you to know that I support your efforts, [player]. You are welcome here anytime.
How would you like access to an unknown location, where you just might be able to find some truly unique ingredients? For $10,000, I can grant you this access. What do you say?
You're going to go far with that kind of spirit. A new secret location is now open to you. You won't find a whole lot there, but what you do find may prove to be of immense value.
How would you like access to an unknown location, where you just might be able to find some truly unique ingredients? For $10,000, I can grant you this access. What do you say?
You're going to go far with that kind of spirit. A new secret location is now open to you. You won't find a whole lot there, but what you do find may prove to be of immense value.
How would you like access to an unknown location, where you just might be able to find some truly unique ingredients? For $10,000, I can grant you this access. What do you say?
You're going to go far with that kind of spirit. A new secret location is now open to you. You won't find a whole lot there, but what you do find may prove to be of immense value.

Look, [player], %ny_den% is a great place to win a lot of money. Great place to lose a lot, too. You've got to be a %rank_4% to get in the door with this crowd, though. Come back once you've made the grade….

Ah, [player], it is my pleasure to welcome you to %ny_den%. Come inside, you can gamble here to your heart's content. Let me warn you, though, there are some seasoned gamblers in here, so tread carefully…

Greetings. I understand that you're down on your luck, [player]. I'm always here to help a Chocolatier in need. Would you like to borrow $3000 for a few weeks? If so, I'll expect to be repaid - with interest. After one month, you'll owe me $4500. Don't worry, I'll find you. Do we have a deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $4500. I'll be seeing you around...
I like to see people meeting their obligations. I'll take that $4500 that you owe me. It has been a pleasure doing business with you.

Howdy, [player]. Looks like you've gotten yourself into another pinch. As I said, I'm always here to help a Chocolatier in need. But this time, my fee has gone up. I'll gladly loan you another $3000. But, you will need to repay me $5000. Don't worry, I'll find you. Do we have a deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $5000. I'll be seeing you around...
I'll take that $5000 now. The pleasure has been mine. See you around, friend...
Well hello again, [player]. Another pickle, I see? Of course I'm here to help. I'll loan you another $3000. And again, you will owe me $5000. Deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $5000. If I were you, I'd get the dough together…
Listen, [player]. I'm going to take that $5000 you owe me. You should mind your finances - I'll be willing to loan you money again - of course - but my interest rate is going up. Good luck...
I get the feeling you are having some trouble managing your finances. I'm happy to help, but my interest rate is now higher. I will loan you $3000, but you must repay me $7500. What do you say?
Just a reminder - you owe me $7500. I'll find you...
Well, hello there, [player]. I'll take that $7500 we agreed to earlier. Fare thee well!
xxxx STORY PROGRESSION TEXT QUESTS xxxx
You're making progress, [player]. Keep up the good work!

Listen, I really didn't expect this, but my father is quite upset. It turns out he's not willing to listen to reason. I'm not sure we're going to be able to enjoy the smooth transition I was hoping for. But don't you fear - I'll keep working on things here.
Not everyone around here at Headquarters is happy about what you're doing, [player], but I sure am!
My father is furious. To be honest with you, [player], I really don't know how long I'll be able to stay on here at Headquarters…
I like it here in Indonesia, although I do miss %sanfrancisco% from time to time. Ah, well, maybe some day, some way, I'll make it back there…
Exotics will hold the keys to our success, [player]. Please, do everything you can to develop new Exotics recipes in your tasting lab to fill your recipe book.

Keep up the good work, [player]. You may need to accumulate a few more Truffles recipes so we can take things to the next level. This is only a suggestion, but have you tried visiting your tasting lab recently?
I am %cas_shopkeep%, and I sit on the board of Baumeister Confections. It is my pleasure to welcome you to my shop. I always enjoy getting to know new chocolatiers, especially those with new ideas!

If I had a dime for every upstart Master Chocolatier wannabe, I'd be a rich, rich man.

But wait, I am a rich, rich man.
So you want to be a Master Chocolatier? Do you really think you've got the goods?
What have we here? Another fly-by-night chocolatier, no doubt. You do realize the while many, many try, very few succeed?

I sincerely hope you have a back-up plan, [player], just in case this whole chocolate empire fantasy doesn't work out for you. I work for Schokolade Weltreich, based in Germany, and we've seen many the likes of you come and go.
Listen, [player]. I am engaged to Alexandra Tangye, and nothing will stop me from marrying her and taking the reigns at Baumeister Confections.
You're getting in pretty deep, [player]. I hope you don't think my brother Christoph will sit idly by and let you undermine his plans….

Things appear to be going well for you, [player]. I'm just thrilled, let me tell you. But know that with success will come additional challenges. You're not naïve enough to believe Joseph Tangye is really going to be all smiles once he finds out what you're up to?
We've got our eyes on you, [player]. Schokolade Weltreich is not a company to be trifled with!
Be on guard, [player]. I have it on good authority that %villain04%, from Schokolade Weltreich in Germany, is planning a little surprise for you….
Was I unclear? I thought I told you not to come around here any more! Now be gone!
I don't know, I find myself having second thoughts about Christoph all of a sudden…
I have made many, many mistakes, [player], and my only remaining hope is that some day, some way, I can reconcile with my only daughter, Alexandra…..
I can't believe the state of the sign over at %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco%. Have you seen it lately? They must really be struggling over there…

[player], have you been to %sanfrancisco% lately and taken stock of the Baumeister Confections Headquarters sign? It looks absolutely atrocious! That company has gone to the dogs, as far as I'm concerned. Such a pity!

Every business has it's ups and downs, sure, but I tell you, Baumeister Confections seems to be just spiraling further and further down hill. When Evangeline was running things, you would never have seen their sign in the condition it's in now, believe me.

I understand what you and Alexandra are trying to do, [player], and I think it's grand. You should be certain to acquire all six factories in the world, though - there's no way you'll be able to get where you're trying to go without taking ownership of all of the factories.
I am %him_mountainkeep%, and my heart belongs to none other than %sf_tutor%. I am a patient man, and I will wait for her.
I know Alexandra, and I know that she will persevere. These things take time, and that is okay by me.

Yes, [player], there are definitely challenges working for the family business. Especially since my father and I don't agree on the best course for the company. He's so old fashioned - I think, deep down, he's uncomfortable with the idea that a woman might be able to lead. Hard to teach old dogs new tricks, as they say....

My father frustrates me to no end. He continues to think that I will 'come around' and learn to love Christoph Moreno. Over my dead body! My heart belongs to none other than Sean Fletcher. Sean's a free spirit and an adventurer - not exactly what my old man considers appropriate. But Sean is honest, kind and smart - essential qualities I find entirely lacking in Christoph.
If you know what's good for you, [player], you'll stay out of things between Alex and her father. What do you have against Christoph, anyhow?

Sure, %sf_bchqkeep% is nominally in charge at Baumeister Confections, but if you ask me, it's really %villain01% who is calling the shots. Now this is just my opinion, but it sure seems to me that Joseph is seeing what he wants to see in that man. With no boys of his own, perhaps Joseph is looking for the son that he never had...

I just don’t know about that Moreno character. Seems like he's making some really bad decisions. I also hear he's been seen a fair amount with %villain04%, who's a pretty powerful man at one of Baumeister Confection's main competitors - Schokolade Weltreich. Certainly makes you wonder, now doesn't it?
You're making exceptional progress, [player]. You know, it wouldn't surprise me one bit to see someone like you running an outfit like Baumeister Confections one day….

I tell you, [player], I smell a rat. I mean think about it - one of the world's great confections empires, allowing themselves to be run into the ground? I think there's more sinister forces at play - I wouldn't be surprised if it comes out one day that that Christoph is not so loyal to the interests of the Baumeister family after all.
Doesn't something strike you as odd about those Moreno brothers? It seems to me like they'd be making some very different decisions if they truly cared about Baumeister Confections….
I hate to say I told you so, but I told you so, didn't I? I saw that Moreno character for what he was from the beginning, and I knew he was up to no good…

My dear son Joseph simply fails to understand that no matter what, Alexandra is not going to capitulate and marry Christoph. She's got too much of me in her, dear child. I spent decades waiting for Jarrah, my true love, and I have no doubt that Alex will hold out in much the same fashion.

Joseph is my son, so I understand how he can feel strongly that no one is good enough for his daughter. At the same time, it's folly for a father to assume that he can control who she will and will not love. We are, after all, well into the 20th century!
I'm a Baumeister myself, so I'm speaking from experience here when I say that we are one stubborn bunch. I do not know which of them is more stubborn, Alexandra or her father Joseph…
I spent years married to the wrong man. My advice to Alexandra has been clear: you must be with the person you long to be with, not with the person anyone else thinks is right for you.
It is impossible to know what is in the hearts of two people. Alexandra needs to stick to her guns and hold out for Sean Fletcher, her true love. I have no doubt this is exactly what she will do.

I've met Alexandra's friend Sean. I do not understand why Joseph has such a hard time with the young man. Too free spirited, I guess. I tell you one thing, I certainly like him a lot more than that Christoph Moreno, who seems to be more and more in charge over there at Baumeister Confections.

You know how you can just get a weird feeling from some people? Well, %villain01% is one of those people for me. I can't put my finger on what it is exactly, but he just kind of rubs me the wrong way.
You seem to be doing well as a budding chocolatier. How nice for you. You don't happen to be in cahoots with someone at Baumeister Confections, by any chance?

I heard some interesting gossip the other day. People are saying that Alexandra Tangye has got some major plans underway. Does this ring any bells with you, [player]? I sure hope you're not mixed up in anything like that. Affairs of the family can get so, so messy.....

So now the cat's out of the bag. You have been working with Alexandra. Things didn't work out quite as you two expected, did they? I am not surprised at all. I've said it before and I'll say it again: women simply do not belong in charge of things.

Are you happy with what you've done, [player]? Your dear little Alex is no longer part of the chain of command over at Baumeister Confections. Do you not feel at least a little responsible for breaking up that family?

OK, [player], I think we've had enough of these silly games. You obviously have a way with chocolates. And you and I, we're really after the same thing - the success of Baumeister Confections - are we not? Like the old saying goes: "If you can't beat 'em, join 'em!" Right? I really think that if we join forces, we might be able to help each other out here...

My brother Tristan will be arriving in %newyork% soon. He's carrying some wonderful new recipes that might really help you grow your business. If you are willing to let him visit your factory there, I'll instruct him to leave the recipes with your factory boss, I believe his name is %ny_factorykeep%? What do you say, do we have a deal?
Too smart for me, eh? Don't think you've seen the last of me yet, [player]!
Terrific. I'm glad you have decided to be reasonable. Stop by your factory in %newyork% in a few weeks to retrieve the recipes….
Give Tristan a few weeks to deliver some new recipes to your factory in %newyork%.

[player], I have an urgent message from %ny_factorykeep%! As instructed, he let %villain02% visit your factory, and that scoundrel managed to sabotage the production floor! Production has been completely halted. You better get to %newyork% right away and reconfigure the factory there, and I hope you'll know better than to trust Christoph Moreno in the future!
%villain02% sabotaged your New York factory, and production is completely halted!

My firm, Schokolade Weltreich, is very impressed with your successes to date, and we would be interested in an exchange of knowledge with you, [player]. If you're willing to arrange a factory tour for me in Paris, I'll be happy to provide you with some new secret ingredients that we have found to be quite popular in our test kitchens. Agreed?
%villain04% will be touring your Paris factory, and then providing you with some new secret ingredients.
My, you're a clever one, aren't you, [player]. Have things your way - we will meet again.
Smart move. I'll make my way over to your factory in %paris%, and I'll instruct my colleagues to prepare to send some secret ingredients to you.

[player], production is stalled at your French factory! I don't have the whole story but, from what I understand, %villain04% was there for a tour and he managed to cause quite a mess! You'll need to travel to Paris and reconfigure your factory as soon as you can.

And you'll definitely want to be more careful about whom you allow on your factory floors!
%villain04% made a mess at %pa_factory% in %paris%, and production is completely halted!

[player], I don't mean to tell you what you should or should not do, but I beg you, no more factory tours for the competition! We've just managed to clean up, and are finally ready to start making chocolates here again…

I'm afraid I am the bearer of some bad news, [player]. It looks like your entire inventory of %milk% has been destroyed. I am not one to point any fingers, but %villain03% was seen just outside of your warehouse at around the same time this was discovered…
Your entire inventory of %milk% has been destroyed. Foul play by %villain03% is suspected.

Let's let bygones be bygones, shall we, [player]. We can be mature about this whole situation, don't you think? If I was to get a look inside your warehouse, I'd be happy to offer you some valuable advice, based on what ingredients I find that you've got on hand. Won't you let me have a peek at your warehouse?
Ha - you fool! I've stolen all of your %sugar%! Never trust a Moreno!
So that's the way it is, eh? Well, you haven't heard the last of the Moreno brothers yet!
%villain02% has stolen your entire inventory of %sugar%.
Go see Alexandra. Certain information has come to light, and she needs to speak with you right away.

[player], I don't want to get too excited, but I think there may be some light at the end of the tunnel. I'm not exactly sure what's happened, but it seems that my father may be changing his thoughts about %villain01% and his ilk. Please do me a favor, visit my mother - you'll find her at %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco%, and see if you can get some more information.
Got to %sf_bchq% and speak with Alex's mother %syd_other2keep%.

After so much time, it is nice to finally make your acquaintance, [player]. I have tried to stay out of the whole mess between my husband and our only daughter, but enough is enough. I'll be honest with you. I never cared for Christoph, and I have been holding my tongue for far too long.

But I now see that scoundrel for what he is. Did you realize that he's been working for Schokolade Weltreich this entire time? No wonder he's been driving our business into the ground.

Anyhow, you two let me work on my husband. In the meantime, go see %him_mountainkeep%. We owe that sweet young man an apology. Bring him 100 cases of your %p_02% on behalf of my husband and I. We'll sort this mess out in short order.
Take 100 cases of %p_02% to %him_mountainkeep% in The Himalayas on behalf of Joseph and Elena Tangye.
Sean is an adventurer, and also a lover of fine chocolates. You can find him on %him_mountain% in The Himalayas.
You have come a long way, did you forget to bring along some chocolates?

You have traveled a great distance to see me, and I am excited to tuck into those delicious chocolates you have brought. You know, [player], I have yet to meet anyone who affects me quite the way Alexandra always has. Just thinking of having her in my arms once again sends my heart racing.

But I am concerned that too much has transpired for us ever to be together again. I'll need some time to think this through. In any event, please go back to the Tangyes in %sanfrancisco%, and let them know that I fully accept their apology. I am not one to hang onto a grudge.
Bring the good news from Sean back to Joseph and Elena at %sf_bchq% in %sanfrancisco%.

We are much relieved, [player]. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. I am glad to hear that Sean has accepted our apology, and I sincerely hope that someday he and Alex can find a way to become reunited.

My husband actually took things better than I had expected. Perhaps deep down he had begun to see the truth. Anyway, here he is, he wants a quick word with you...

I just wanted to apologize in person, [player], and to thank you for your persistence. I hope that there may be a chance for us - me, you, and Alexandra - to continue to work through our differences and repair our relationship. She's one strong-willed young woman, but I guess I do have to admit that I see where she gets it from.
Let me thank you again, [player]. Without your efforts, I don't know where we'd all be today….

Life couldn't be sweeter, really. Sean and I divide our time between 2 fantastic locations, %sanfrancisco% and %jakarta%. We are doing wonderfully, and I am working on my relationship with my parents as well. How could I possibly thank you enough, [player]?
You have repaired a giant hole in my heart, [player], and words can not express how happy you have made me!
You have done wonderful things for our family, [player], and we all wish you nothing but continued success with Baumeister Confections!
I am ruined! And it's all your fault!
That's quite a bridge construction project they've got going over in San Francisco. They say it's going to be a wonder of the modern world. Have you had a chance to see it yet?

I never really thought of a bridge as works of art before, but I tell you what - tthat Golden Gate bridge they're constructing in San Francisco is changing the way I think about bridges, and art. It's stupendous!

I just heard that a proposal for a Golden Gate Bridge was approved for construction in San Francisco. From what I hear, it's going to be a real engineering marvel. It'll be a couple of years yet, of course, before they start building the thing, but it's going to be pretty amazing, that's for sure.
I had a chance to be one of the first people to walk across the Golden Gate Bridge. Wow, what a view! That bridge really is something special.

I tell you, that Golden Gate Bridge truly is one of the wonders of the modern world. I just never get tired of looking at that magnificent structure. I look forward to it every time I get a chance to be in San Francisco.
Have you seen the construction that's afoot in New York City right now? They're putting up the Empire State Building - and they say it's going to be the tallest building in the entire world!

It's amazing what kinds of things can be done these days. I was there for the opening of the Empire State Building in New York City - the President of the United States turned on the lights by pressing a button in Washington, D.C.!

We've got a wonder of the modern world here in our Empire State Building. Almost 1500 feet tall, and the first building in the world with over 100 floors. It's also got over 100 bathrooms. Did you know the building was actually designed from the top down?

The Empire State Building is beautiful, that much I'll give you. But did you know that in its first year of operation they made more from the tourists on the observation deck - over a million dollars - than the owners made in rent?

If you haven't seen it yet, you should make a point to visit %newyork% and check out the skyline. They've just finished the Chrysler Building - the first man-made structure that stands taller than 1000 feet.
Sure, the Empire State may be taller, but the Chrysler remains the world's tallest brick building.
